Phrase en Anglais: Greetings adventurer! I'm so glad you've come, kupo!
Phrase en Français: Bonjour, adventurier(e)! Je suis tellement content que vous soyez venu(e), kupo!

Phrase en Anglais: To celebrate the safe recovery of all eleven of King Kupofried's mog tablets, we're offering a limited-time teleportation service for the low, low price of ${number: 0} gil! What do you say?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les tablettes mog ayant été toutes récupérées, nous proposons actuellement un service de téléportation pour ${number: 0} gil, kupo !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Your wish is my command, kupo!
For a small fee of ${number: 0} gil, that is...${prompt}
Looks like you're light on funds, kupo... Sorry!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous n'avez pas assez d'argent, kupo...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: What's this? You're still new to this land?
Phrase en Français: Oh ! Vous êtes un aventurier(e) novice, n'est-ce pas ?

Phrase en Anglais: I'm afraid you're not yet strong enough to handle our potent moogle magic!
Phrase en Français: Je suis désolé, mais vous ne pouvez pas utiliser ce service, kupo.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Just forget I said anything, kupo!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Oh, non ! On dirait que les tablettes mog se sont de nouveau dispersées.

Phrase en Anglais: Oh, what a shame! The mog tablets have been scattered to the winds once more!
Phrase en Français: Le service de téléportation est donc malheureusement interrompu, kupo...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Without their power, I'm afraid we can't help you, kupo.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous trouvez un registre de contrats de chasse rédigé par le réseau d'entraide mutuelle entre aventuriers, l'A.M.A.N. Il contient une liste d'ennemis cruels.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: A hunt registry has been placed here by the Adventurers' Mutual Aid Network (A.M.A.N.). Its pages are laden with the names of spine-chilling monsters.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous trouvez un registre de contrats de chasse rédigé par le réseau d'entraide mutuelle entre soldats, le S.M.A.N. Il contient une liste d'ennemis cruels.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: A hunt registry has been placed here by the Servicemen's Mutual Aid Network (S.M.A.N.). Its pages are laden with the names of spine-chilling monsters.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Faire le compte rendu d'un contrat accompli.
Lire les annotations sur les contrats de chasse.
Vérifier le contrat de chasse en cours.
Annuler le contrat de chasse en cours.
Vérifier le nombre actuel de feuillets.${prompt}
Un nouveau contrat de chasse ne peut être choisi si celui en cours n'est pas préalablement annulé.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You must cancel your current hunt if you wish to undertake another.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Un certain temps de repos est nécessaire après un contrat de chasse, avant de pouvoir en choisir un autre.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Little time has passed since your last hunt. It is recommended that you take some time to recuperate before undertaking another.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Un contrat de chasse ne peut pas être sélectionné en même temps qu'un programme d'entraînement des manuels de bataille.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You cannot undertake a hunt while a training regime is active.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Annuler le programme d'entraînement du manuel de bataille en cours ?
Le programme d'entraînement du manuel de bataille a été annulé.${prompt}
Un nouveau contrat de chasse ne peut être choisi si celui en cours n'a pas préalablement fait l'objet d'un compte rendu ou été annulé.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You must either notify the completion of, or cancel your current hunt in order to undertake another.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Cette page contient le contrat de chasse suivant:${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The information on this page instructs you to defeat the following:${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Choisir ce contrat de chasse? (Nombre actuel de feuillets: ${number: 0})
Le contrat de chasse a été sélectionné!${prompt}
Vous ne disposez pas d'assez de feuillets.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You do not have enough scylds.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ce registre de contrats de chasse répertorie les ennemis nuisant à nos activités de manière à confier leur élimination aux aventuriers les plus courageux.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The hunt registry is a tome through which seasoned adventurers can undertake assignments to eliminate monsters deemed to be impediments to A.M.A.N. activities.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ce registre de contrats de chasse répertorie les ennemis nuisant à nos activités de manière à confier leur élimination aux soldats les plus braves.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The hunt registry is a tome through which veteran soldiers can undertake assignments to eliminate monsters deemed to be impediments to S.M.A.N. activities.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il est possible d'accepter un contrat de chasse en proclamant son intention d'éliminer un ennemi de la liste.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Assignments, or “hunts,” can be undertaken simply by selecting the name of a monster listed in the registry.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La force des ennemis a été évaluée et annotée par nos soins pour permettre à ceux qui le désirent de choisir un contrat de chasse à la hauteur de leur habilité au combat.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Pertinent information such as monster elusiveness and ferocity has been recorded for your reference.
Phrase en Français: Toutefois, les combats avec ces ennemis étant très dangereux, nous avons fait en sorte qu'un contrat de chasse ne puisse être obtenu par ceux qui suivent un programme d'entraînement des manuels de bataille.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: As safety cannot be guaranteed, we ask that you hunt within your ability.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Le contrat sera alors considéré comme rempli pour tous si les équipiers abattent cet ennemi tous ensemble une fois.{prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Hunts pit you against creatures of extreme ferocity, and are not intended for training.
Phrase en Français: Une fois l'ennemi éliminé, faire un rapport dans ce registre permet d'obtenir une récompense relative à la force de l'ennemi ainsi que des feuillets en gage de certification.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: For this reason, you cannot undertake a hunt while a training regime is active.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ces feuillets donnent la possibilité d'entreprendre des contrats plus difficiles dont les récompenses sont encore plus intéressantes.

Phrase en Anglais: Should party members undertaking a common hunt defeat the objective, the kill will be considered valid for all.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ils ne peuvent cependant pas être récupérés si le contrat est annulé. Choisissez donc judicieusement.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Upon the completion of a hunt, record your success in a hunt registry.
Phrase en Français: Abattre un ennemi étant une périlleuse et éprouvante tâche, une période de repos, durant laquelle aucun nouveau contrat ne peut être choisi, est nécessaire après complétion.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Doing so will earn you rewards corresponding to difficulty as well as “scylds”--tokens of your valor.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Votre rapport de complétion du contrat de chasse a été enregistré.

Phrase en Anglais: More scylds will grant you access to increasingly difficult and rewarding assignments.
Be warned, however, that once expended, scylds will not be refunded for any reason.${prompt}

Lastly, please note that a mandatory cool-down period will be imposed upon all hunters following the completion of a hunt. Until this time has elapsed, you will not be permitted to undertake another hunt.${prompt}

In case you didn't already know, a volatile objectaru like that needs to be kept in a special container.${prompt}
Such a container can be synthesized if you have two ${item-plural: 0[2]} and ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}.
And if my memory serves me true, ${article} ${item-article: 2[2]} serves as the bonding agentaru.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 0[2]}, I hear, can be had within the Maze of Shakhrami. Not lying scattered about the floors, obviously.
One of the crawlers there might be willing to partaru with one, but if not...well, you adventuring types know what to do.${prompt}
Naturally, to synthesize ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, you'll be needing one of those, too.${prompt}
You wish to synthesize ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}? Ah, yes. Well do I know that recipe!
Toss ${article} ${item-article: 3[2]} into the mix, and what you seek shall be yours.${prompt}
I fear we haven't ${item-plural: 0[2]} here. But it should please you to know that skeletons dwelling within the Gusgen Mines are known to drop one on occasion.${prompt}
What brings you here? Well, ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, of all things...
You couldn't hope to make one without some ${item-plural: 1[2]}, but I fear they aren't often stocked by vendors.${prompt}
But you strike me as an intrepid type, so I'll share with you some knowledge to help you on your way.
Head over to Ordelle's Caves. Hunt enough bats there, and you might just come into some ${item-plural: 0[2]}. That's the main ingredient required to make ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}.${prompt}
All that remains, then, is to bind it with ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} using ${article} ${item-article: 2[2]}. Good luck!${prompt}
I daresay, you're the one “she” sent, yes?${prompt}
Can I count on you to aid my investigation once more?${prompt}

At my client's behest, I have procured the item you require. But alas, doing so drained far more of my time and resources than had been reckoned. As recompense for having exerted undue effort, I would ask a favor of you. Do as I say, and you may consider the item yours.${prompt}
Very good. I knew I could count on us being on the same page.
Now then, without further ado, I shall explain the task to you. It truly is simple.${prompt}
You are to investigate a number of creatures dwelling within the Sea Serpent Grotto in my stead.${prompt}
Should you not possess ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} and ${item-plural: 1[2]}, I can furnish you with both for a nominal fee of 800 gil.${prompt}
Using the ${item-singular: 0[2]} will turn ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} into ${article} ${item-article: 2[2]}--a visual record of the subject's physical characteristics.${prompt}
I'm currently investigating the ${entity: 0}, the ${entity: 1}, and the ${entity: 2}.${prompt}
Hm? It appears you are overburdened.
Speak with me again after you've reorganized your belongings.${prompt}
“She” would not be pleased to hear of this.${prompt}
A truly menacing image of the ${entity: 0}!
All that remains, then, is one each of the ${entity: 1} and the ${entity: 2}.${prompt}
I can provide you with both for a nominal fee of 800 gil.${prompt}
Should you not possess ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} and ${item-plural: 1[2]}, I can furnish you with both for a nominal fee.
I've recently depleted my stores, however, so you will have to wait until the next shipment arrives.${prompt}
It appears you haven't enough gil.${prompt}
Ah, a positively imposing image of the ${entity: 0}!
All that remains, then, is one of the ${entity: 1}.${prompt}
With this image of the ${entity: 0}, I hold your task fulfilled.${prompt}
As promised, I relinquish this to you.
Should another be required, you shall find me here.${prompt}
I need images of the ${entity: 0}, the ${entity: 1}, and the ${entity: 2}.${prompt}
You've yet to bring me images of the ${entity: 0} and the ${entity: 1}.${prompt}
You've yet to bring me an image of the ${entity: 0}.${prompt}
A fine image this is, but this creature isn't one of my investigation subjects.${prompt}
I fear I haven't the time to trade pleasantries with random strangers. Please leave me be.${prompt}
Is there something else you wish of me?
You already have what you came for, no?${prompt}
We don't know what you're doing here, but truth be told, we're not really interested.${prompt}
Gorattz! Bompupu! Show ${choice-player-gender}[him/her] what the Tenshodo thinks of meddlesome adventurers!${prompt}
D-damn... I'm in way over my head...${prompt}
Waaah! I didn't signy-wign up for this...${prompt}
The ${choice: 0}[Skeleton Scuffler/Blest Bones/Holey Horror/Steely Weapon/Lode Golem/Fired Urn] fades away into nothingness...${prompt}
The power of the Great Star Tree has been released!${prompt}
We warmly welcome you to the place of your unmaking.${prompt}
From your ground bones, a loaf of bread we shall be baking.${prompt}
We shall curse you unto death!
Prepare to breathe your final breath!${prompt}
We will make you beg to die!
Six fulms under you will lie!${prompt}
Naughty children shall receive no quarter!
Curl up and die, this is your empress's order!${prompt}
The punishment will be brutal and gruesome!${prompt}
Which way do you like it--slow or fast?
Should you lose a limb, be not aghast!${prompt}
You'll wish you were never born!
From your torso limbs will be torn!${prompt}
Steel yourself for a wicked fright!${prompt}
We shall set your pants alight!${prompt}
The world shall bow before our might!${prompt}
This outcome, we did not foresee...${prompt}
Be this a dream? Or is it real?
This ending falls sorely short of ideal...${prompt}
'Twas high time you were made to know
that your abilities are purely for show.
A fitting end for a talentless crew
that tried to bite off more than it could chew.
Your body absorbs the power held within the ancient runes!${prompt}
You cannot enter this battlefield with ${keyitem-article: 0[2]} in your possession.${prompt}
It appears you must wait longer to commence the battle.${prompt}
You are not in possession of ${keyitem-article: 0[2]}.

It appears you should come back later.${prompt}

Unable to enter the battlefield for “Battaru Royale.”${prompt}
The sap crystal has no effect.

Unable to enter the battlefield for “Project: Shantottofication.”${prompt}
The Tablet of Hexes has no effect.

Your opponents deem you too weak to be worthwhile, disappearing whence they came.${prompt}
You receive nothing from the moon rabbit...${prompt}
The moon rabbit has brought along a monster!${prompt}
You have to do something about those crazy trees, kupo!${prompt}
I'll have you know that only the rightful leader of the Star Onion Brigade can sit there! Get down right now before I charge you with trees-on and disturbing the peas!${prompt}
I don't know how you got inside, but that area is off limits. Vacate the premises immediately!${prompt}
Light on your feet today, I see!${prompt}
Are these also creations conjured up with Tarutaru magic?${prompt}
I am Melek, the consul of Bastok.${prompt}
Do you know of the Republic of Bastok?
It is a land far across the seas to the west of Windurst, with a rich mining town as its capital.${prompt}
Windurst, Bastok and San d'Oria fought together in the Great War of twenty years ago and formed a friendly alliance with Jeuno at its head.${prompt}
That is why each country has consulates set up in each other's capitals.${prompt}
Sorry, but I'm not much of a talker. If you have no business with me, then don't speak to me.${prompt}
Bastok is surrounded by a mountain range and has many Galka living in it, so it seems to have the image of an untamed land.${prompt}
But there are romantic spots, such as the view of the drawbridge at sunset. If you are out to make sweet memories in Bastok, you can't go wrong in that area.${prompt}
Hiya! This is the Consulate of Bastok. It's a little piece of Bastok that's like an oasis in the midst of Windurst.${prompt}
Oh, it's not that I dislike Windurst. The beauty of this place is superb, with not a speck of dirt in sight.${prompt}
I guess that's because the Tarutaru line of vision is so close to the ground, that they don't let a single thing that's been dropped slip by them.${prompt}
Befaw the Great War, there weren't nawn of these here consulawtes. So whens yaw went to a fawreign country, yaw felt awl alone.${prompt}
I'm rooly jealous of travelers tawday. If anything happens to them, theys can just go to the nearest consulawte faw help.${prompt}
Oh, you have some business with Consul Melek? Then please head into her office through that door there.${prompt}
I am Melek, the consul of Bastok. I trust you had a safe sail here?${prompt}
So, you are ${name-player}...the one who accepted the cooperative mission to Windurst, I see?${prompt}
Well then, Gold Skull, why don't you start by informing our fair citizen here about what the mission involves?${prompt}
The mission from our comrades in Windurst entails the oblation of magic weapons to Giddeus, the frontline to the abode of the Yagudo beastmen.${prompt}
One of the magic weapons to be dedicated to Giddeus will be handed to you at Heavens Tower, here in Windurst.${prompt}
Your orders are to help carry those magical weapons to the Yagudo treasure chamber, deep beneath Giddeus.${prompt}
Yes, well, I guess if you put it frankly, you are carrying a tribute to a pack of beastmen.${prompt}
You see...in order to maintain the peace of their country, the Windurstians have formed amicable relations with the Yagudo.${prompt}
But, as you've probably realized, it's hard to call their relationship amicable when you witness the outrageous behavior of the Yagudo.${prompt}
So we have to try to curtail the beastmen's military potential without losing the trust of Windurst.${prompt}
That's where your real purpose comes in. Gold Skull, please explain the rest of the mission...${prompt}
After receiving the magical weapons from Heavens Tower in the Windurst Walls district, you are to return here to the Consulate of Bastok and present the weapons to us.${prompt}
We will exchange these with a different weapon, which you will take to Giddeus as an offering instead.${prompt}
Of course, the fact that we are switching weapons is to remain top secret.${prompt}
We are forbidden from meddling in the internal affairs of another country. However, we wish to save Windurst from its dangerous predicament.${prompt}
Well, you had better get going. I pray that your mission is a success.${prompt}
Ask Gold Skull for further explanation if you need clarification. I pray that your mission is a success.${prompt}
You are to proceed to Heavens Tower and obtain a shipment of magical weapons. Then you are to return back here to the Consulate of Bastok at once.${prompt}
Once we have switched the weapons, you are to head to Giddeus and offer them to the Yagudo.
You're wondering what you should do if the Yagudo realize you switched weapons on them, aren't you?${prompt}
Well, that's where your abilities as an adventurer come into play. You should be able to think of something, shouldn't you?${prompt}
The real magical weapons will be shipped back to Bastok, where our soldiers will make far better use of them than the Yagudo ever would.${prompt}
Take this sword to Giddeus instead.
Your mission went without incident, I trust?${prompt}
We've sent the real magic weapons like the one you brought us, back to our homeland. They'll come in useful for expelling the Quadav from around Bastok.${prompt}
Well, I presume you have to proceed to the Consulate of Bastok in San d'Oria next.${prompt}
It is another long journey to reach San d'Oria. You have to travel from Mhaura to Selbina by boat first, then follow the land route north for quite a way.${prompt}
Don't overdo yourself. Rest up a little before you head to your destination, San d'Oria.${prompt}
I hope to see you safe and well again someday. Take care, ${name-player}.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Si j'avais su que c'était si délicat, je n'en aurais pas demandé. C'est impossible pour moi de transporter une chose si fragile chez moi.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Why didn't you tell me that it melts away when you touch it with your bare hands? How am I supposed to carry that home then?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Maître Sigismund ne fera aucun compromis et ne prendra aucun vieux cadeau pour sa femme. Et si vous avez déjà rencontré la femme, vous ne lui en voudrez pas!${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But then again, you kept your side of the bargain, and a promise is a promise, so here... Take your reward and leave me be.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Mais à ce rythme, nous ne pourrons jamais rentrer chez nous. Aaa~h, comme ma famille et mes amis me manquent.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If I had known it was that delicate I wouldn't have asked for one. It's impossible for me to carry such a fragile thing back home.${prompt}
Looks like I have to think of some other souvenir to take back, otherwise the little missus is gonna kill me. Umm... Let me see...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Voici la guilde des pêcheurs, où les fils de la mer se rassemblent! Si l'un de vous, les terriens, a un os à choisir avec nous, allez-y, faites-moi plaisir!${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Master Sigismund won't compromise and take back any old present to his wife. And if you've ever met the woman, you wouldn't blame him!${prompt}
But at this rate, we'll never be able to go home. Aaa～h, how I miss my family and friends.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Et tant qu'il y aura des poissons là-bas, que ce soit sous la pluie ou par vents hurlants, je garderai mon bateau voguer!${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: This, me hearty, be the Fishermen's Guild, where sons of the sea gather! If any of ye landlubber-wubbers have a bone to pick with us, then go ahead, make me day!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Le temps est traître, si vous n'êtes pas prudent, vous finirez dans la cale de Davy Jones!${prompt}
Vous n'êtes pas un bon vigie à moins de prêter attention, non seulement aux vagues et au vent, mais aussi aux nuages et aux oiseaux.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: And so long as there be fish out there, be it through rain or howling winds, I'll keep a row-row-rowing me boat!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Un membre de la guilde des pêcheurs, le capitaine Chipmy-Popmy, n'est sorti en mer que quelques fois.${prompt}
Il est trop occupé avec les responsabilités de la guilde, telles que l'allocation des zones de pêche aux gens ou la surveillance de la météo, pour être en mer à pêcher.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The weather is treacherously changeable, that if you're not careful you'll end up in Davy Jones's locker!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Voici la boutique de la guilde des pêcheurs. De quels fournitures avez-vous besoin aujourd'hui?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You ain't much of a lookout unless you pay attention, not just to the waves and the wind, but to the clouds and the birds as well.${prompt}
A member of the Fishermen's Guild, Captain Chipmy-Popmy, has only ever been out on a ship a handful of times.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Quand vous répandez l'appât de cette manière, les poissons se rassemblent tous, et leurs écailles brillent à la lumière. C'est vraiment joli...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: He's too busy with the responsibilities of the guild, such as allocating fishing grounds to people or monitoring the weather, to be out there fishing from a ship.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Avez-vous déjà essayé la pêche? C'est essentiellement un concours de volonté entre vous et le poisson, mais il n'y a pas de plus grande joie que lorsque vous attrapez enfin un gros...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: This be the Fishermen's Guild shop. What supplies will you be needin' today?${prompt}

Avez-vous déjà essayé la pêche? C'est essentiellement un concours de volonté entre vous et le poisson, mais il n'y a pas de plus grande joie que lorsque vous attrapez enfin un gros...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: When you scatterrr the bait like this, the fish all gatherrr togetherrr, and theirrr scales shine in the light. It's rrreal purrretty...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Mais vous pouvez aussi dire les conditions des eaux à partir des poissons que vous attrapez. Plus vous vous associez avec la mer, plus vous la comprenez.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Have you ever tried your hand at fishing? It's basically a contest of willpower between you and the fish, but there's no greataruer joy than when you finally catch a biggy...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Prenons les eaux par ici, par exemple. En fonction de la grosseur des ${item-plural: 1[2]}, vous pouvez déterminer où lancer vos lignes ensuite.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But you can also tell the conditions of the waters from the fish you catch. The longer you associatarue yourself with the sea, the more you come to understand it.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Donc, si vous vous attrapez un ${item-plural: 1[2]}, montrez-le-moi s’il vous plaît. Cela m’aidera à décider de nos plans de pêche.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Have you ever tried your hand at fishing? It's basically a contest of willpower between you and the fish, but there's no greataruer joy than when you finally catch a biggy...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: En fonction de la taille des ${item-plural: 1[2]}, je peux déterminer le meilleur endroit pour nous lancer nos lignes ensuite.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But you can also tell the conditions of the waters from the fish you catch. The longer you associatarue yourself with the sea, the more you come to understand it.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Si vous attrapez un ${item-plural: 1[2]}, je vous serais reconnaissant de me le montrer pour que je puisse le vérifier.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Take the waters around here, for instaruance. Depending on how fat the ${item-plural: 1[2]} are, you can work out where to best cast your lines next.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: So, if you happen to catch yourself ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, please show it to me. It'll help me decide our fishing plans.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Oh... Elle n’est pas si dodue, n’est-ce pas. Hmm... Nous ne pouvons pas nous attendre à une bonne prise pour le moment.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Depending on how big the ${item-plural: 1[2]} are, I can work out the best place for us to cast our lines next.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Merci pour votre coopération. \nTenez...\nOh, et je vais garder celle-ci, donc considérez cela comme une compensation, d’accord?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If you catch ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, I'd be gratarueful if you gave it to me to check.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Je pense que les travailleurs ici cuisineront cette fille et la mangeront pour le dîner. Les gens qui travaillent avec la mer ont des estomacs aussi grands que leurs cœurs.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Oh, so you caught yourself ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, huh? Let me have a littarule looky-looky...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: À l’extérieur de la ville de Windurst, à travers cette porte, se trouve l’ouest de Sarutabaruta. C’est un endroit dangereux pour le débutant aventurier.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Gee... She's not that chubby-wubby, is she. Hmm... We can't expect a good catch just yet.${prompt}

C'est un endroit idéal pour explorer et un endroit idéal pour se blesser. Avant de sortir, assurez-vous que vos armes et armures sont équipées, et que vous avez les affaires dont vous avez besoin. Vous voulez devenir un aventurier accompli, n'est-ce pas?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Oh, and I'll hang on to this girl, so let that serve as compensation, all right?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous voulez visiter la Tour des Cieux? C'est juste de l'autre côté de Windurst depuis cette zone portuaire, donc vous devrez monter tout au nord.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I'll think the workers here will cook up this girl and have her for dinner. People who work with the sea have stomachs as big as their hearts.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La Tour des Cieux est un bâtiment qui a été envahi et couvert par un arbre étoilé géant qui est si grand que ses racines sont censées maintenir le monde ensemble. C'est l'endroit le plus célèbre de tout Windurst, donc vous devriez aller jeter un coup d'œil.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Outside of the town of Windurst, through this gate, lies West Sarutabaruta. It's a dangerous placey-wacey for the beginner adventurer.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Le district portuaire, par sa nature même, a beaucoup de gens qui vont et viennent tout le temps, donc les chances de rencontrer de mauvaises compagnies sont plus grandes.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If you become lost-wosty, open your map to check your current location. For instance, right now we're on the corner of square B-5 of Port Windurst's map.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ne laissez pas la brise marine fraîche vous monter à la tête. Gardez toujours vos esprits!${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If you head up this road from Fishmonger Landing, you'll come to the western gatehouse. If you head out through Shiva's Gate there, you'll find yourself in West Sarutabaruta.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Au-delà de cette porte se trouve la zone résidentielle de Windurst, où vous pouvez séjourner dans une Maison de Mog ou Louer-une-Chambre.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: It's a great place to explore and a great place to get wounded. Before you venture outside, ensure that your weapons and armor are equipped, and that you have the belongings you need. You want to become an accomplished adventurer, don'taru you?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Si vous avez besoin d'une explication, c'est le travail de Boronene.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Alors prenez votre courage à deux mains, et demandez à Boronene là-bas tout ce dont vous avez besoin de savoir.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Heavens Tower is a building that has been overtaken and covered by a giant star tree that is so big, its roots are said to hold the world together. It's the most famous spot in the whole of Windurst, so you should go have a looky-look.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La soi-disant porte vers les cieux, l'agence de voyage aérien, est là-bas, dans ce bâtiment en face de nous. Vous le voyez, n'est-ce pas?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The porrrt district, by its very naturrre, has a lot of people coming and going all the time, so the chances of meeting up with bad company is greaterrr.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Windurst a retrouvé sa paix, alors maintenant, les riches venant d'autres terres viennent nous rendre visite. Si vous leur parlez, ils pourraient vous raconter une histoire ou deux sur ce qui se passe dans le reste du monde.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: This is the super-duper Orastery. Here we run the Mage Academy, which organizes the mages that serve as town guards.${prompt}

If you are looking for our Minister, he's run off on one of his mumbo-jumbo experiments somewhere, and it doesn't look like he's coming back for quite some time. Oo～h, I wish I knew where he went...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: C'est une zone d'entraînement à la magie. C'est bien trop dangereux pour un Monsieur Tout-le-Monde de traîner ici !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Either you are extremely brave to entaru such a dangerous place as this...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez accéder à la zone d'entraînement extérieure depuis l'arrière de la plateforme là-bas, mais l'extérieur est encore plus dangereux qu'ici. Soyez particulièrement prudent si vous vous dirigez là-bas !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ...or you don't know much about our Mage Academy, do you?${prompt}
The guard platoons who protect Windurst at each gatehouse... They're all affiliatarued with our Orastery.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: C'est toujours le même vieux bam-bam et boum-boum sur la même vieille cible d'entraînement Cardian, encore et encore, jour après jour...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But they are just simple guards. It's not until they join the War Warlocks that they can feel any real pride in belonging to the Orastery.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Peu importe à quel point la magie est fantastique ! Si je ne peux l'utiliser qu'ici, alors ce n'est rien de plus qu'un vieux spectacle ennuyeux de feux d'artifice. Oh, comme je veux essayer mes sorts sur de vrais monstres !${prompt}
Je, je, je suis un nouvel arrivant à l'Orastere. M-mais mon rêve est d'être comme le grand héros Karaha-Baruha, et de rendre un grand service à mon pays pendant la guerre.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: This is a magic training area. It's far too dangerous for your average Joe Blow to be hanging around here!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous voyez... Je pense qu'une guerre est sur le point de commencer. E-et beaucoup de gens vont mourir, comme lors de la dernière guerre. Je, je veux empêcher cela de se produire !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can reach the outdoor training area from behind the platform there, but outside is even more dangerous than it is in here. Be especially careful-wareful if you're heading out there!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Je suis, oh je suis, Ohruru. J'étudie la magie de changement de statut depuis près de vingt-cinq ans maintenant, oh maintenant-maintenant-maintenant.${prompt}

Mais ma recherche est loin d'être terminée, oh terminée-terminée-terminée. Je suis déterminé à continuer à étudier jusqu'à ce que ces yeux voient un état d'altération de l'esprit incroyablement stupéfiant, oh altération.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: It's just the same old wow-kapow and kaboom-a-boom-boom on the same old dummy Cardian target, over and over, day in and day out...${prompt}

It doesn't matter how fantastic-a-wastic the magic is! If I can only use it in here, then it is no more than a boring old fireworks display-a-way. Oh, how I want to try my spells out on real monsters!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Si jamais vous vous retrouvez avec un étrange effet de statut, laissez-le et venez me voir, oh moi-moi-moi !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I, I, I'm a newcomer to the Orastery. B-but my dream is to be like the great hero Karaha-Baruha, a-and do a great service to my country during w-war.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il y a plusieurs effets de statut que je paierais cher pour voir, comme, oh disons, "silence" ou "malédiction", oh malédiction-malédiction-malédiction. Mais c'est plutôt difficile, oh difficile, de trouver un spécimen vivant-vivant-vivant. Teh-heh-heh...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You see...I think a war's about to begin. A-and a lot of people are gonna die, like in the last war. I, I wanna stop that from happening!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La Grande Guerre d'il y a vingt ans a été une tragédie lamentable. Tant de brillants guerriers des Sorciers de Guerre de l'Orastery ont été abattus.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I am, oh am, Ohruru. I have been studying status changing magic for nigh on twenty-five years now, oh now-now-now.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Trop est perdu en période de guerre. Même si une véritable paix, la chose la plus précieuse de toutes, est obtenue...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But my research is far from over yet, oh yet-yet-yet. I'm determined to keep on studying until these eyes see a mind-numbingly incredible status ailment, oh ailment.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il n'y a pas assez de Sorciers de Guerre pour que nous puissions mener une guerre en ce moment. Après tout, cela ne fait que vingt ans depuis la dernière...${prompt}
Il n'y a pas eu assez de temps pour former des gens compétents, donc nous serions vraiment dans le pétrin si une guerre éclatait soudainement, n'est-ce pas ?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If you ever happen to have a strange status effect cast on you, leave it be and come see me, oh me-me-me!${prompt}

Why, there's a number of status effects I'd pay good money to see, the likes of, oh say, “mute” or “bane,” oh bane-bane-bane. But it's kind of hard, oh hard, to find a living specimen-men-men. Teh-heh-heh...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: J'ai déjà assez de mal à combattre mes propres tendances à la paresse !

Phrase en Anglais: The Great War of twenty years ago was a woeful tragedy. So many brilliant warriors of the Orastery's War Warlocks were felled.${prompt}
Too much is lost in times of warfare. Even if true peace, the most precious thing of all, is gained...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Aa～ah. Peu importe à quel point je m'entraîne chaque jour, mes pouvoirs magiques ne semblent pas s'améliorer. On pourrait penser que la magie s'améliorerait comme par magie, n'est-ce pas ?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: There ain't enuff War Warlocks for us to fight a war right now. Afta' all, it's only been twenty -dd years since the last one...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Pourquoi, c'est exactement comme s'entraîner au combat ou au tir à l'arc ! La magie était-elle censée être ainsi ?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: There ain't been enuff time to train skilled people, so we'd be in a right proper fix if a war started all o' a sudden, wouldn't we now?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Est-ce que les mots "résistance élémentaire" vous disent quelque chose ? Comme, plus votre résistance au feu est forte, moins vous subirez de dégâts des sorts de feu, et ainsi de suite... ?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Shut ya mouth and leave me alone!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Eh bien, ne vous méprenez pas là-dessus. Juste parce que votre résistance au feu est forte, cela ne signifie pas que les sorts de feu que vous lancez sont également forts. Vous comprenez ce que je veux dire ?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I'm having enough trouble fighting off me own lazy tendencies as it is!
Phrase en Français: Pourquoi, oh pourquoi, on dirait que vous avez un petit ennui de santé, ma chère, oh chère-chère-chère !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Aa～ah. No mattaru how much I practice every day my magic powers just don't seem to be improving. You'd think magic would improve like magic, wouldn'taru?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Je vous paierai une petite somme si vous me laissez essayer de vous guérir.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Why, this is just the same as practaruicing fencing or archery! Was magic meant to be like this?${prompt}
Do the words “elemental resistance” mean anything to you? As in, the stronger your resistance to fire is, the less damage you will receive from fire magic, and so on...?${prompt}
Well, don't go getting it wrong, now. Just 'cause your fire resistance is strong doesn'taru mean the fire magic you cast is strong as well. You get whataru I mean?${prompt}
Why, oh why, you look as if you've got a bit of an ailment, dear, oh dear-dear-dear!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Je vais tenter ma chance ailleurs.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I'll pay you a small fee if you let me try to cure you.${prompt}
Oh well. May as well get well.
Phrase en Français: Êtes-vous sûr, oh sûr, que c'est ce que vous voulez vraiment faire-faire-faire ?${prompt}

Si vous me demandez, oh moi, vous avez besoin d'un peu plus d'aventures à votre actif-fait-fait.${prompt}
Vous aviez un très bon sort “malédiction” sur vous, oh vous-vous-vous.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Are you sure, oh sure, that's what you really want to do-do-do?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Voici votre récompense, comme promis-ed-ed. Mais si vous me demandez, oh moi, je pense toujours que vous avez besoin de plus de sensations fortes dans votre vie-vie-vie.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Hmph... Your status was only, oh only, “mute.” Why that was no challenge at all-all-all.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Je pense que vous avez besoin d'un peu plus, oh plus, de sensations fortes dans votre vie. Il n'y a pas de temps pour s'amuser une fois que vous êtes parti-parti-parti.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Here's your reward, oh reward, as promised. My prescription is that you should get out more-more-more.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Quelle merveilleuse “épidémie” vous aviez contractée là, oh là-là-là. Vous avez rendu mon travail encore plus excitant-ting-ting.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If you ask me, oh me, you need a little bit more adventuring under your belt-belt-belt.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Voici la récompense, oh récompense, que je vous avais promise-ed-ed. Hé, que diriez-vous de devenir mon cobaye privé--je veux dire--patient ? Je promets des aventures excitantes-ting-ting.${prompt}
Devenez mon patient privé et je vous garantis une vie palpitante-tante-tante, oh vie-vie-vie.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Quel (teh-heh) aliment intéressant (teh-heh) vous aviez, oh aviez-aviez-aviez.

Phrase en Français: On dirait qu'on voit beaucoup Semih Lafihna, la Garde Sibylle qui protège la grande Étoile Sibylle à la Tour du Ciel, dans le coin ces derniers temps.${prompt}
Je me demande s'il y a eu un incident qu'elle vérifie ici ? Je parie que c'est encore ce Voleur de Chats qui fait des siennes !${prompt}
Comment ça se fait que les Humains et les Elvaans changent autant d'apparence en vieillissant ?${prompt}

Voilà la célèbre Académie de Magie, bastion de la méchanceté !${prompt}
En vérité, c'est le ministre de ce ministère qui est vraiment le plus notoirement méchant là-bas !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I wonder if there was some kind of incident that she's checking out here? I bet it's that Cat Burglar getting up to her usual tricks again!${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: How come Humeys and Elvaanys changey so much in appearance as they get oldery?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I bet they never get boredy-woredy changing so muchy everyday. Maybe they even enjoy growing oldery?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les Mithras viennent à l'origine d'une autre terre, loin de l'autre côté des mers. On dit que les Mithras sont arrivées à Windurst pour nous prêter main forte quand nous étions en guerre avec les hommes-bêtes.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: That there is the notorious Mage Academy, bastion of badness!${prompt}
Well, in truth, it's the minister of this ministry who's really the notoriously bad one there!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Silence ou ma fille va me remarquer. Je la suis pour m'assurer qu'elle ne se mette pas dans le pétrin...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Wowy-wow-wow! You see them from here? Those high-level magic users are practaruicing their spells over there!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ah～w... Tu vois, elle se trompe complètement. La magie de haut niveau ne s'achète pas ici. Elle était censée aller aux Eaux de Windurst pour ça ! Qu'ai-je fait pour mériter un enfant pareil ?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The Orastery operates that Mage Academy, which is in charge of training and running the armies of pro magic users. Oh, what I'd give to be able to join them!${prompt}
Keep heading east through here, and you'll be on the road to Windurst Woods, home to most of the Mithra in this town.${prompt}
The Mithra are originally from another land, far across the seas. They say the Mithra originally arrived in Windurst to lend us a hand back when we were at war with the beastmen.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Maman m'a envoyé faire des courses plus difficiles que d'habitude aujourd'hui, mais Paruru ne s'en soucie pas. Paruru peut gérer ça !
Tu vois, j'ai réussi à venir jusqu'à cette boutique de magie toute seule ! Maman va être tellement contente !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Be quiet or my daughter will notice me. I'm shadowing her to see that she doesn't get into any trouble-wouble...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La vente de magie de haut niveau aux aventuriers a été restreinte depuis la dernière cérémonie de la Lecture des Étoiles, mais ils ont décidé de lever l'interdiction.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Ah～w... See, she's got it all wrong. High level magic can't be bought here. She was supposed to go to Windurst Waters for that! What did I do to deserve a child-wild like this?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il semble qu'Ajido-Marujido, le ministre de l'Orastérie, ait fait pression sur les autres ministres pour obtenir gain de cause.${prompt}
Quels types de terres existent dans le vaste monde qui se trouve de l'autre côté de ces océans ? Je rêve d'être comme ces aventuriers qui voyagent à travers la mer vers des terres inconnues.${prompt}
Je sais qu'il y a des dangers inimaginables qui les attendent là-bas, mais on dit que l'esprit d'une fille adore le danger.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Mommy sent me on a harder shopping errand than usual today, but Paruru doesn't mind. Paruru can handle this!
Phrase en Français: Je suis heureuse que les bêtes ne sachent pas comment piloter des navires. Vous voyez, Windurst est pratiquement sans défense contre les attaques venant de la mer.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: See, I made it all the way to this magic shop on my own! Mommy is going to be sooo pleasedy-weasedy!${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I'm glad beastmen don't know how to steer-a-weer ships. You see, Windurst is practically defenseless against attack-a-wacks from the sea.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: It'd be a different matter if Cardians could swim-a-wim, but those automatons have a hard enough time trying to keep afloat-a-woat!${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Comment acquérir les compétences nécessaires pour devenir un maître-chasseur, ou "ranger". Cela me rappelle que je dois rencontrer Perih Vashai... Elle devrait être dans la partie Mithra de la ville...${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Mais j'ai choisi d'obéir à la voix de la nature et de partir à l'aventure en tant que guerrière. Même si ma terre natale me manque, je sais que je n'y remettrai probablement jamais les pieds...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Ahhh... But it is trrrue that my bow skills seem like child's play when comparrred to the likes of those women. I guess I must go and learrrn to hunt from scrrratch underrr the guidance of my trrribal chieftainness.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Mais pour les Mithra comme moi, qui sont nés après la guerre, Windurst est la seule maison que nous connaissons.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: I was invited to join the secrrret meeting behind the warrrehouses, but I can't find them. What's a girrrl to do?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Donc c'est l'un des monstres-poupées en bois créés par les Tarutaru, hein ?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: On the otherrr side of this ocean therrre is a small harborrr town that is the homeland of us Mithra. My motherrr and sisterrr still live therrre.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But I chose to obey the voice of naturrre and jourrrney out into the unknown as a warriorrr. Even though I pine for my homeland, I know I probably will neverrr set foot on its ground everrr again...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: On dit que les mages rouges utilisent la magie pour enchanter leurs épées ! Pourraient-ils vraiment être si irresponsables ? Ils tueraient la noble lame !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Windurst Woods, the predominately Mithra parrrt of town, lies beyond herrre. If you arrre interrrested in handicrafts then you will be pleased to know that the Boneworkers' Guild and Weavers' Guild are located therrre.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La voie de l'épée est de couper tout ce qui n'est pas l'épée ! Les sentiments superflus, les pensées vagabondes, et les artifices de la magie n'ont pas leur place. Même les rayons du soleil ne devraient pas être autorisés à errer le long de son acier, vraiment.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: There's no place like home, heh? Well, there arrre some Mithra who say this is not and will neverrr be theirrr home...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les aéronefs ont été inventés par Jeuno, vous savez ? L'Archiduc de Jeuno croit que nous nous dirigeons vers une ère des cieux, alors il a rassemblé des génies pour créer ces navires volants.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But for Mithra like myself, who were borrrn after the warrr, Windurst is the only home we know.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Mais savoir cela ne diminue en rien l'émerveillement que ces choses suscitent...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: So this is one of the wooden puppet-monsters the Tarutaru created, eh?${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il y a des vols réguliers de Jeuno vers Windurst, San d'Oria, et Bastok, donc nous finirons par retourner sur l'aéronef entre Windurst et Jeuno.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Why, it looks a lot cuter than I had expected. Let's see if it will eat these nuts. Here boy, eat! C'mon eat it, boy!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: J'espère que notre prochain poste sera à San d'Oria... une fois que j'aurai acheté tous les souvenirs que je veux de Windurst, bien sûr.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: 'Tis said that red mages use magic to enchant their swords! Could they truly be so irresponsible? They would kill the noble blade!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il semble que nous, les Galka, soyons rares dans ces parages.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The way of the sword is to cut away all that is not the sword! Superfluous feelings, wandering thoughts, and the trappings of magic have no place. Not even the sun's rays should be allowed to roam along its steel, really.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il y a un flux constant de Tarutaru, chacun prenant son tour pour nous observer. Bien que cela ne me fasse pas me sentir indésirable, cela ne me met pas non plus à l'aise.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The airships were invented by Jeuno, you know? The Archduke of Jeuno believes we are heading into an age of the skies, so he gathered masterminds together to create those flying ships.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: S'ils sont si intéressés par nous, pourquoi ne viennent-ils pas nous voir de plus près, au lieu de jeter des coups d'œil depuis les ombres ?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: But knowing that by no means lessens how amazing those things are...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Je veux leur dire en face, mais ces Tarutaru s'enfuient avant que je puisse les approcher.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: There are regular flights from Jeuno to Windurst, San d'Oria, and Bastok, so we'll eventually be returning on the airship between Windurst and Jeuno.${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Beurk, si ça peut apaiser ce sentiment, alors peut-être que c'est pour le mieux. Dites simplement désolé à tous mes fans à la maison...${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Laisserai-je quelque chose derrière moi pour qu'ils se souviennent de moi...? BAAARRRRFFFFF!!!${prompt}

Phrase en Français: J'ai entendu dire que Windurst est une terre de magiciens, mais on dirait que tout le monde ici ne sait pas vraiment utiliser la magie.${prompt}

But I bet she's looking high and low forrr herrr prrrecious Mana Orrrb! Hee-hee-hee... Rrrevenge is so sweet!${prompt}
I wonder if mithuth Cat Burglar ith angry? Did Pichichi do thomething bad?${prompt}
Did you really-weally have a showdown with the Cat Burglar?${prompt}
Why don't you guys let me join in all the fun? Ohww, I'm always left out!${prompt}
Quickly, to fill you in on what you missed, well...something terrible happened!${prompt}
The Cat Burglar came by a moment ago and tried to scare us into returning the Mana Orb to her.${prompt}
She said it was too dangerous for the likes of us, 'cause some evil Cardians are after it! But we weren't fooled by her!${prompt}
She tried hard to break us, but we stood our ground until she gave up and sulked away! We won again! Yippee!${prompt}
But then something funny happened. When we checked the box we kept the Mana Orb in, it was empty! So, we're all wondering where-oh-where has our little Mana Orb gone?${prompt}
Now I propose we go hunt down the criminal! So how about you then? Are you in on it, too?${prompt}
Oh! That can only mean one thing...
But if you keep up the wet blanket act, we'll kick you out of our Star Onion Brigade! I'm warning you!${prompt}
Said like a true Star Onion! We superheroes never let baddies get away with their crimes!${prompt}
In order to catch the criminal we'll need the seven gadgets found in the Junior Investigator's Toolkit!${prompt}
Everyone knows what to do, rightaru? Each bring one gadget and meet back here! Then we can form our own real crime-fighting investigation unit!${prompt}
In order to catch the criminal, we'll need the seven gadgets found in the Junior Investigator's Toolkit!${prompt}
So, each of us is to go find one gadget and meet back here! Then we can form our own real crime-fighting investigation unit!${prompt}
You're looking kind of lotht! Lithten! I'll give you thome help...${prompt}
If you athk my mommy nithely, she'll make you ${keyitem-article: 1[2]} to help dithguise yourthelf with!${prompt}
In times like dese, you need a magnifying glass! Dat's elementawy, my dear Watson-wotson! Ahem...${prompt}
If I had a hammer, I'd hammer in the evening, hammer in the morning, hammer everybo～da～y!♪ Who needs a lockpick when you have a hammer to bish-bash locks with?${prompt}
Hmm...but that's just as bad as a robber? Oh well, then again, who cares about the minor points...?${prompt}
We'll be needing a lamp if we arrre going into darrrk places!${prompt}
Not that my Mithra eyes arrre bad or anything... Just that it'll hopefully scarrre away them ghosties!${prompt}

In orderrr to talk with each otherrr when we split up and are farrr away, we'll need a string-telephone. ${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} would be betterrr, I know, but we don't have enough money to buy one!${prompt}
One of the seven gadgets found in the Junior Investigator's Toolkit? Umm... Well... Maybe I'll bring a shovel! I kinda dig them! Ohww, but I'm so left out, I don't know what to do!${prompt}
Looks like we have all seven gadgets as found in the Junior Investigator's Toolkit!${prompt}
You don't have your gadget yet!
What in hell's bells are you doing with it, Pichichi?${prompt}
So da cwime was committed by one of us! Dis is an intwiguing turn of events!${prompt}
I didn't want you to give thith pretty ball away to anyone, tho, tho...${prompt}
Tho when I heard Kohlo-Lakolo wath going to give it away to thomebody, I dethided to thecretly hide it!${prompt}
So, it was Pichichi who took it and hid it away! Well, chalk up another one to the Star Onion Brigade, 'cause it looks like this mystery is also solved!${prompt}
I was forgetting that this Mana Orb is a priceless treasure of our Star Onion Brigade.${prompt}
After all, it's the first spoils we ever took from that Cat Burglar!${prompt}
That pretty ball ithn't jutht your ordinary ball!${prompt}
I can't explain why it ith different, it jutht ith!${prompt}
I'm disappointed dat I didn't get to show off my mega-fly magnifying glass.${prompt}
Did you know that if I aim my magnifying glass at dwy leaves dey cwickle-cwackle until dey suddenly burst into flames!${prompt}
Erg...I so wanted to show off my hammer-hammering skills.${prompt}
I wanted to become famous for “Gomada-Vulmada's 300 Super-Swift Mega-Hits”!${prompt}
What was it you brrrought with you?${prompt}
I wonderrr whetherrr it will be morrre useful than my lamp for scarrring away ghosties? Brrr...${prompt}
Grrr... After I went to all that trrrouble of getting Motherrr to make me a strrring telephone.${prompt}
It's all Pichichi's fault. I don't know why I hang out with this bunch of fools!${prompt}
The culprit is always the one you least suspect. I know 'cause I've read almost every one of the Agatha Crystalie mystery series. So you can leave this case to me.${prompt}
What do you mean, they've already solved “The Case of the Missing Mana Orb”? But the great detective Shanruru didn't get to make her appearance!? Ohww, they always leave me out!${prompt}
It seems as if the Cat Burglar has been coming and going in and out of the ghosty house!${prompt}
We should be investigating what she's up to in there, but that haunted house has a magic lock placed on its doors!${prompt}
I hear if we had the minister's ring we could unlock the place, but we can't just run up to Doctor Koru-Moru and borrow it from him, can we...?${prompt}
What's that ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} you have there...? Where have I seen that before?${prompt}
Ah! That's a little old but it looks like the minister's ring. Oh, and I've seen that insignia somewhere... That's the ghosty house's mark!${prompt}
The time for us to catch the Cat Burglar has come! We can now open the doors to the ghosty house!${prompt}
Let's go to the ghosty house before the Cat Burglar gets away! C'mon, move it, move it!${prompt}
The ring that you found was probably the previous Minister of the Optistery's ring. So long as we have this, we can handle any magic that the Optistery can throw at us.${prompt}
Let's go to the ghosty house and nab that Cat Burglar once and for all! C'mon, move it, move it!${prompt}
Ah! That's a little old, but it looks like the minister's ring. Oh, and I've seen that insignia somewhere... That's the ghosty house's mark!${prompt}
So you've found the key at last! Too bad we won't be needing it anymore...${prompt}
You see, while you were away, we heard news that the Cat Burglar had entered into the ghosty house. So naturally, we all headed straight to the crime scene!${prompt}
If only you had come by earlier, you could have been part of the action. But, oh well, too bad!${prompt}
Anyway, that ring you have there is mega-awesome! You should give it to the Star Onion Brigade to mind. You know, one for all and all for none, that kinda thing...${prompt}
Hey, how come you didn't come with us to the ghosty house? What, were you too afraid, or something?${prompt}
And we had a totally wild experience. You see...${prompt}
It's the Star Onion Brigade's greatest adventure yet!${prompt}
Oh, and what we told you just now has to be kept a secret from the grown-ups, okay?
♪Cross you heart and hope to die, stick Cactuar needles in your eye?♪${prompt}
We don't need any stwategies 'cause we have da twaps and other devices dat we'd been pweparing especially for dis day.${prompt}
I have a feeling dat we'll catch da Cat Burglar for sure today!${prompt}
It's the final showdown! Good will at last conquer evil-wevil!${prompt}
The Cat Burrrglar's in the bag...I guess you could say.${prompt}
We'll teach herrr not to give us Mithra a bad name!${prompt}
We won't let herrr get away this time!${prompt}
...like we're being called to from thomewhere.${prompt}
I'm going to be left out again.We'll I don't care anymore!${prompt}
You, ${choice-player-gender}[mister/miss], are going to be beaten by the wily Cat Burglar again, along with the rest of those losers!${prompt}
Pichichi brought Joker back here with her, so we made him a member of the Star Onion Brigade.${prompt}
But you better keep it a secret from the other grown-ups. Cardians are under the control of the Manustery. If they find out about him, they'll take him away from us!${prompt}
We've got dat Cardian, Joker, hiding away.${prompt}
If any gwown-ups find him, dey'll take him away to the Manustewy. We can't allow dat to happen...not until we solve Joker's mystewy.${prompt}
They don't eat anything at all!${prompt}
Not like us people who eat to live and live to eat!${prompt}
Perrhaps he was teased by grrrown-ups so much that he hid in that house and fell asleep... Well that's what I think!${prompt}
With all these strrrange new memberrrs who've joined lately...there goes our Brrrigade!${prompt}
But I suppose the morrre people we have the merrrierrr it is. Well, at least when we play tag...${prompt}
Why does everyone have to call Mithter Ghothtie “Joker” for?${prompt}
I liked the name Mithter Ghothtie better!${prompt}
I'm glad you all made it back safely!${prompt}
You took so long to return that I got so worried and began to cry!
