Phrase en Français: Que diriez-vous d'une carte magique pour vous aider dans vos aventures ?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: How about a magic map to help you on your adventures?${prompt}

Phrase en Français: Si vous appartenez à un groupe ou à une alliance, vous pouvez également vérifier la position de vos alliés.
Et en fonction de votre travail, vous pouvez repérer des PNJ et des ennemis de loin.${prompt}
De plus, vous pouvez même enregistrer des points spécifiques dans la zone ou faire marquer des lieux pour certains événements.
Vous voyez donc, les cartes magiques sont extrêmement utiles.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If you have a map, you can check both the lay of the land and your location whenever you enter an area.${prompt}
If you belong to a party or alliance, you can also check the position of your allies.
And depending on your job, you can find NPCs and enemies from afar.${prompt}
Furthermore, you can even record specific points in the area or have places marked down for certain events.
So you see, magic maps are extremely useful.${prompt}
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} covers Ronfaure, the La Theine Plateau, the Valkurm Dunes, Jugner Forest, Selbina, and San d'Oria.
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} covers Gustaberg, the Konschtat Highlands, the Pashhow Marshlands, and Bastok.
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} covers Sarutabaruta, the Tahrongi Canyon, the Buburimu Peninsula, the Meriphataud Mountains, Mhaura, and Windurst.
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} covers Batallia Downs, Rolanberry Fields, the Sauromugue Champaign, and Jeuno.
This complete ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]}, which extend far beneath La Theine Plateau, costs ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${keyitem-plural: 1[2]} include layouts for both outpost and fortress of Ghelsba, as well as the Yughott Grotto. It costs ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} shows the notorious Orcish stronghold hidden within Jugner Forest. It is priced at ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
This map shows the waterways and islands that make up Carpenters' Landing. It is priced at ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]}, as the name implies, contains the layout of Bastok's Zeruhn Mines.
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]}, as the name implies, contains the layout of the Palborough Mines, which lie in North Gustaberg.
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]}, as the name implies, contains the layout of the Quadav stronghold, Beadeaux, that is located in the Pashhow Marshlands.
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]}, as the name implies, contains the layout of Giddeus, which you can reach from West Sarutabaruta.
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} contains the layout of the Yagudo stronghold, Castle Oztroja, located in the Meriphataud Mountains.
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} contains the layout of the underground maze of Shakhrami that can be found in the Tahrongi Canyon area.
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} covers the Sanctuary of Zi'Tah, Ro'Maeve, and the Hall of the Gods.
This map covers Bibiki Bay and its nearby islands.
The ${keyitem-singular: 1[2]} outlines the geography of nearby Qufim Island. It costs ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
Located beneath Batallia Downs, the Eldieme Necropolis is shown in detail on this map. The price is ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
The Garlaige Citadel, which lies upon the Sauromugue Champaign, is illustrated in this map. Each copy costs ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${keyitem-plural: 1[2]} include Kazham, as well as both jungles of Yuhtunga and Yhoator for ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${keyitem-plural: 1[2]} include ${zone: 2[2]} as well as ${zone: 4[2]} for ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${keyitem-plural: 1[2]} include ${zone: 2[2]}, as well as ${zone: 4[2]} and ${zone: 5[2]} for ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les cartes de la région de Kuzotz comprennent le désert d’Altepa ainsi que Rabao pour ${number: 3} gils.${prompt}
Les cartes de la région de Vollbow comprennent le cap Teriggan, ainsi que la vallée des Chagrins et le tunnel de Gustav pour ${number: 3} gils.${prompt}
Les cartes du tunnel de Korroloka sont, comme leur nom l'indique, des cartes du tunnel de Korroloka, qui relie le désert d'Altepa et les mines de Zeruhn.${prompt}
La carte d’Al Zahbi comprend également Aht Urhgan Whitegate et le Colisée. Elle coûte ${number: 2} gils.${prompt}
Cette carte montre la disposition de la ville de Nashmau sur l’île d’Azouph. Elle coûte ${number: 3} gils.${prompt}
Cette carte montre la région forestière s’étendant à l’ouest d’Al Zahbi. Une carte des Bois de Wajaom peut être la vôtre pour ${number: 3} gils.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Maps of the Kuzotz region include Altepa Desert as well as Rabao for ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Cette carte montre les fourrés de Bhaflau, situés au nord d’Al Zahbi. Elle coûte ${number: 3} gils.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Maps of the Vollbow region include Cape Teriggan, as well as Valley of Sorrows and Gustav Tunnel for ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: ${keyitem-article: 1[2]} est une ancienne carte qui était souvent utilisée pour représenter ${zone: 2[2]}. Elle coûte ${number: 3} gils.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Maps of the Korroloka Tunnel are, as their names imply, maps of the Korroloka Tunnel, which connects Altepa Desert and Zeruhn Mines.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: (Oui, c'est bien ce que j'ai dit !)${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The map of Al Zahbi also includes Aht Urhgan Whitegate and the Colosseum. It costs ${number: 2} gil.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: (Mais tu sais quoi ? Oh, attends. Attends un instant...)${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: This map shows the layout of the Azouph Isle town of Nashmau. It costs ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Je suis désolé, puis-je vous aider ?${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: This map shows the forest tract stretching west of Al Zahbi. A map of the Wajaom Woodlands can be yours for ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: ${color-alt: 15}${name-player} pointe vers l’objet dans la main de ${name-npc}.

Phrase en Anglais: This map shows Bhaflau Thickets, lying to the north of Al Zahbi. It costs ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Oh, ça ? C’est une coquille magique appelée ${item-article: 1[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${keyitem-article: 1[2]} is an older map that was often used to depict ${zone: 2[2]}. It costs ${number: 3} gil.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous voulez en savoir plus sur ${item-plural: 1[2]} ?
Laissez-moi vous en dire plus à leur sujet !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: (But you know what? Oh, wait. Hold on...)${prompt}
I'm sorry, can I help you?${prompt}
${color-alt: 15}${name-player} points to the item in ${name-npc}'s hand.
Oh, this? It's a magical shell called ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}.${prompt}
Let me tell you all about them!${prompt}
What do you want to ask?
Phrase en Français: Ces coquilles magiques regorgent de mystères...${prompt}
On peut en obtenir de magnifiques perles.
Certains disent que ce sont des formes nouvelles de coquilles, mais...${prompt}
Même si vous retirez une perle, elles en produisent de plus en plus.
Ce qui est encore plus étrange, c'est que les perles extraites de la même coquille transmettent réellement le son, peu importe la distance qui les sépare !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: These magic shells are full of mysteries...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ainsi, si vous parlez dans l'une des perles, les personnes qui détiennent d'autres perles ou la coquille dont elles sont issues peuvent vous entendre !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can get beautiful pearls from them.
Phrase en Français: C'est comme s'ils étaient liés par un fil invisible... Huh. Je suppose que c'est pourquoi ils ont "lien" dans leur nom.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Some say these are some new form of shall shells, but...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Donc, de toute façon, les coquilles s’appellent ${item-plural: 1[2]}, et les perles ${item-plural: 2[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Even if you take out a pearl, they make more and more of them.
Phrase en Français: Il existe également différents types de ${item-plural: 1[2]}.${prompt}
Y a-t-il autre chose que vous voulez savoir ?

Phrase en Anglais: What's more strange is that pearls taken from the same shell actually transmit sound, no matter how far apart they are!${prompt}
So, if you speak into one of the pearls, people who hold other pearls or the shell they were made from can hear you!${prompt}
It's as if they were linked by an invisible thread... Huh. I guess that's why they have "link" in their names.${prompt}
So anyway, the shells are called ${item-plural: 1[2]}, and the pearls ${item-plural: 2[2]}.${prompt}
There are also different types of ${item-plural: 1[2]}.${prompt}
Is there anything else you want to know?
What do you want to ask about?

Phrase en Français: ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 0[2]} sont des ${item-plural: 1[2]} lorsque vous les achetez pour la première fois au magasin.${prompt}
Une fois ouverts, ils commencent à produire des ${item-plural: 2[2]} et deviennent l’outil de communication que tout le monde utilise.${prompt}
Vous pouvez définir la couleur et le nom de votre ${item-singular: 1[2]} lorsque vous l’ouvrez. Assurez-vous de choisir ceux que vous aimez car vous ne pouvez pas les changer par la suite !${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 1[2]} sont des ${item-plural: 0[2]} qui ont été ouverts et fonctionnent comme un outil de communication.${prompt}
Vous pouvez fabriquer des ${item-plural: 2[2]} et des ${item-plural: 3[2]} à partir de ces coquillages.
Ils sont comme le chef de groupe dans un groupe d'aventuriers.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 0[2]} are ${item-plural: 1[2]} when you first buy them at the store.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Tous les objets créés par votre ${item-singular: 1[2]} conservent la couleur et le nom de votre ${item-singular: 1[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Once opened, they start making ${item-plural: 2[2]} and become the communications tool everyone's using.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Choisissez un nom unique pour qu'il soit facile à mémoriser.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can set the color and name of your ${item-singular: 1[2]} when you open it. Make sure to set the ones you like because you can't change them afterwards!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 2[2]} sont des perles que les ${item-plural: 1[2]} produisent.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 1[2]} are ${item-plural: 0[2]} that have been opened and function as a communications tool.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Si vous en équipez une, vous pouvez communiquer avec les personnes qui possèdent les mêmes ${item-plural: 2[2]} et le ${item-singular: 1[2]} dont elles sont issues.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can make ${item-plural: 2[2]} and ${item-plural: 3[2]} from those shells.
Phrase en Français: Ils sont comme les membres d'un groupe dans une équipe d'aventuriers.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: They're like the party leader of an adventuring party.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: ${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 3[2]} est un sac rempli de ${item-plural: 2[2]}. Vous pouvez en fabriquer un en métamorphosant un ${item-singular: 2[2]} à cet effet.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: All items created by your ${item-singular: 1[2]} retain the ${item-singular: 1[2]}'s color and name.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il n’aura pas toutes les fonctionnalités de ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, mais vous pouvez retirer une quantité infinie de ${item-plural: 2[2]} comme ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Make the name something unique so that it's easy to remember.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous devez utiliser ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} pour fabriquer ${article} ${item-article: 3[2]}. Il en va de même si vous voulez le reconvertir en ${article} ${item-article: 2[2]}.${prompt}
Ils sont comme les chefs d'alliance des groupes d'aventuriers...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If you equip one, you can communicate with people who have the same ${item-plural: 2[2]} and the ${item-singular: 1[2]} they were made from.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous voulez savoir comment les utiliser ?

Phrase en Anglais: They're like the party members in an adventuring party.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 3[2]} is a bag full of ${item-plural: 2[2]}. You can make one by metamorphosing a ${item-singular: 2[2]} for that purpose.${prompt}
It won't have all the features of ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, but you can take out an endless amount of ${item-plural: 2[2]} like ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}.${prompt}
You have to use ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} to make ${article} ${item-article: 3[2]}. The same goes if you want to turn it back into ${article} ${item-article: 2[2]}.${prompt}
They're like the party leaders of an alliance of adventuring parties...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Attribution d'une couleur et d'un nom.

Phrase en Anglais: You want to know how to use them?
What do you want to know about?

Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez acheter des ${item-plural: 1[2]} dans les magasins. Ils sont un peu chers, cependant.${prompt}
Il serait peut-être préférable de demander à des amis qui veulent des perles de participer.${prompt}
Un ${item-singular: 0[2]} fraîchement acheté n’a ni couleur ni nom.${prompt}

${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} devient utilisable uniquement après avoir choisi sa couleur et lui avoir donné un nom. Ensuite, vous pouvez l’utiliser pour fabriquer des ${item-plural: 2[2]}.${prompt}
Vous pouvez combiner différentes quantités de bleu, de rouge et de vert pour obtenir la couleur de votre coquillage.
Vous ne pouvez utiliser que des lettres de l'alphabet pour le nom, mais vous pouvez utiliser des majuscules et des minuscules où vous le souhaitez.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can buy ${item-plural: 1[2]} in shops. They're a little pricey, though.${prompt}
It might be best if you ask friends who want pearls to chip in.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les fabriquer est facile. Équipez simplement votre ${item-singular: 1[2]}, puis allez dans “Linkshell” dans le menu et sélectionnez “Créer une perle” !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: A freshly bought ${item-singular: 0[2]} has neither a color nor a name.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Tous les ${item-plural: 2[2]} fabriqués de cette manière conservent la couleur et le nom de votre ${item-singular: 1[2]}, il est donc facile de savoir qui peut vous entendre !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} becomes usable only after you've chosen its color and given it a name. Then you can use it to make ${item-plural: 2[2]}.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez fabriquer autant de ${item-plural: 2[2]} que vous le souhaitez, quand vous le souhaitez, donc ne vous inquiétez pas d’en fabriquer trop!${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can combine different amounts of blue, red, and green to make your shell's color.
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez également fabriquer des ${item-plural: 2[2]} avec ${article} ${item-article: 3[2]} de la même manière.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can only use alphabet letters for the name, but you can use capital and lowercase letters anywhere you want.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Oh, et... vous utilisez également votre ${item-singular: 1[2]} pour fabriquer des ${item-plural: 3[2]}, mais c’est un peu compliqué alors je vous le dirai plus tard.${prompt}
Vous devez équiper ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} pour qu’il ait un effet.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Making them is easy. Just equip your ${item-singular: 1[2]}, then go to “Linkshell” in the menu and select “Create Pearl”!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Allez dans “Linkshell” dans le menu, choisissez le ${item-singular: 1[2]} que vous souhaitez équiper, et vous êtes prêt !${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: All ${item-plural: 2[2]} made this way retain the ${item-singular: 1[2]}'s color and name, so it's easy to tell who can hear you!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: C'est un peu différent d'équiper des armes et des armures.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can make as many ${item-plural: 2[2]} as you want, whenever you want, so don't worry about making too many of them!${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Après avoir fait cela, une icône représentant ce que vous avez équipé apparaîtra à côté de votre nom. C'est là que la couleur que vous avez choisie devient visible.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You can also make ${item-plural: 2[2]} with ${article} ${item-article: 3[2]} the same way.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Si quelqu’un vous “vérifie” dans cet état, il pourra voir le nom du ${item-singular: 1[2]} que vous portez.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Oh, and...you use your ${item-singular: 1[2]} to make ${item-plural: 3[2]}, too, but it's a little complicated so I'll tell you later.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Suivez les mêmes étapes pour équiper des ${item-plural: 2[2]} et des ${item-plural: 3[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You have to equip ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} for it to have any effect.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Pour parler dans ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, passez en mode “linkshell” dans votre chat, et tout ce que vous direz sera entendu par tout le monde ayant le même “lien”.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Go to “Linkshell” from the menu, choose the ${item-singular: 1[2]} you want to equip, and you're all ready to go.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous pouvez également taper “/linkshell” et taper votre message. La version abrégée est “/l” (minuscule “L” pour “linkshell”).${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: It's a little different from equipping weapons and armor.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ah, mais bien sûr, vous devez d’abord avoir ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, ${item-singular: 2[2]}, ou ${item-singular: 3[2]} équipé.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: After you've done this, an icon that represents what you've equipped will appear beside your name. This is where the color you chose becomes visible.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ce que vous direz ne sera entendu que par les personnes ayant le ${item-singular: 1[2]}, ${item-singular: 2[2]}, ou ${item-singular: 3[2]} avec le même lien.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: If someone “checks” you in this state, they will be able to see the name of the ${item-singular: 1[2]} you have on.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Donc, si vous voulez cesser d’écouter votre lien, il vous suffit de déséquiper votre ${item-singular: 1[2]}, ${item-singular: 2[2]}, ou ${item-singular: 3[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Follow the same steps to equip ${item-plural: 2[2]} and ${item-plural: 3[2]}.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: ${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} peut métamorphoser les ${item-plural: 2[2]} et ${item-plural: 3[2]} d’autres personnes. Bien sûr, cela ne peut affecter que ceux qui ont été fabriqués à partir du même ${item-singular: 1[2]}.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: To speak into ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, change your chat mode to “linkshell,” and whatever you say will be heard by everyone who has the same “link.”${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il existe deux types de métamorphoses, qui sont :

Phrase en Anglais: You can also type “/linkshell” and type your message. The shorter version is “/l” (lowercase “L” for “linkshell”).${prompt}
Phrase en Français: 1: Transformer en sac / Transformer en perle

Phrase en Anglais: Ah, but of course, you have to have ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, ${item-singular: 2[2]}, or ${item-singular: 3[2]} equipped first.${prompt}
Whatever you say will only be heard by people who have the ${item-singular: 1[2]}, ${item-singular: 2[2]}, or ${item-singular: 3[2]} with the same link.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Les deux nécessitent que la cible ${item-singular: 2[2]} ou ${item-singular: 3[2]} soit équipée au moment de l’utilisation.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: So if you want to stop listening to your link, all you have to do is unequip your ${item-singular: 1[2]}, ${item-singular: 2[2]}, or ${item-singular: 3[2]}.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La métamorphose “Transformer en sac / Transformer en perle” transforme la cible ${item-singular: 2[2]} en ${article} ${item-article: 3[2]} et vice versa.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: ${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} can metamorphose other people's ${item-plural: 2[2]} and ${item-plural: 3[2]}. Of course, it can only affect those that were made from the same ${item-singular: 1[2]}.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: C’est utile si vous voulez que quelqu’un d’autre se charge de distribuer les ${item-plural: 2[2]} à votre place.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: There are two types of metamorphoses, which are:
Phrase en Français: La métamorphose “Jeter” rompt en réalité le lien avec la cible ${item-singular: 2[2]} ou ${item-singular: 3[2]} et la transforme en déchet.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: 1: Make into sack / Make into pearl

All three nations are striving daily to put more regions under their control. This is what we call “conquests.” You can take part in it and serve your country by defeating enemies while you have Signet cast on you.${prompt}
Each region comprises several areas, and the nation that rids those areas of the most monsters gains control of the region.${prompt}
Nations receive goods and resources from regions under their control.${prompt}
So, the more regions we control, the richer our nation becomes.${prompt}
Border guards are also placed in outposts within regions under our control.
They are there to cast Signet on adventurers like yourself.${prompt}
Once you have your nation's Signet, you will be able to acquire crystals from enemies you defeat.${prompt}

Not only that, but you will also receive conquest points. You get more conquest points if you defeat enemies in regions that are not under your nation's control. These points can be used to purchase items from guards like myself.${prompt}
So you see...conquests benefit nations and adventurers alike.
We expect you to do your best to serve your country.${prompt}
You can see the current state of conquests by selecting “Region Info” from the main menu.
Conquest results in all regions are regularly recalculated, so you may want to check them from time to time.${prompt}
Shops in our city will be selling different items according to our conquest rank.
The Troupe Valeriano will also visit the nation that finishes first and bring a little joy to its citizens.${prompt}
You can donate crystals to your nation once you achieve rank 2.

Complete missions and take part in conquests to raise your rank and serve your country.${prompt}
You are awarded conquest points when you defeat monsters while you are taking part in conquests.
Select "Region Info" from the menu to check your current number of conquest points.${prompt}
You can purchase items from guards like myself with your conquest points, but be warned that the number of points you spend will be subtracted from your current total.${prompt}

When conquest results are announced, you will be told which country controls the region you are in at that time. Sometimes regions may become neutral, or beastmen may even gain control of regions.${prompt}
If we gain control of a region, border guards will be placed at its outposts to help adventurers like you.${prompt}
Merchants will also be placed there, and goods from that region will find their way to the local shops here.${prompt}
Gaining control of regions is the basic principle behind conquests. We need each of you to do your best, and bring our nation to the top of the ranks.${prompt}
Of course, sometimes we lose regions to other nations...so we must try to take them back before the next conquest results are announced.${prompt}
As an incentive, we will award you with more conquest points for defeating monsters in those regions.${prompt}

But if we are allied with another nation, you will only be awarded the regular rate for defeating monsters in our allies' regions. On the other hand, we will award you with more points for fighting in the top-ranked nation's regions.${prompt}
Our paramount concern lies in the beastmen gaining control of our regions.
If too many of us are defeated in a region, the beastmen will gain control of it.${prompt}
If this happens, not only is it a great blow to our pride, but you will be unable to acquire any crystals in that region.${prompt}
The beastmen are a menace to all nations. If they rise to power, we must all unite and drive those vile creatures from that region.${prompt}
We need you to bring supplies to the outpost border guards who are placed in regions under our control.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Pay 120 gil for a fortune telling?
Phrase en Français: La bonne fortune remplit votre coupe à ras bord. Assurez-vous de la partager avec ceux qui sont moins bénis par le destin.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Now, let us see what the winds portend...${prompt}
Phrase en Français: La journée à venir sera remplie d'épreuves et de tribulations, mais avec le temps, le chemin devant vous redeviendra lisse.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Adventuring with ${entity: 0} today will ${choice: 1}[bring you great fortune!/be highly profitable./bring fair fortune./be mutually advantageous./bring misfortune./be perilous./be disastrous!]${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Il peut y avoir des divergences d'opinion aujourd'hui, mais abordez-vous mutuellement avec un esprit ouvert et tout ira bien.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Good fortune fills your cup to overflowing. Be sure to share it with those less blessed by fate.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous devez compter sur les forces de chacun pour surmonter les difficultés que vous rencontrerez aujourd'hui. Ne laissez pas les querelles futiles causer votre perte.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Stand together and you have little to fear. With your combined strength, you can overcome any obstacle.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Veuillez accepter ce modeste cadeau en célébration de votre bonne fortune.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Do not let your good fortune blind you to danger. Pitfalls aplenty await the unwary traveler.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous ou ${entity: 0} avez déjà entendu la volonté capricieuse du destin aujourd’hui. Vous ne pouvez faire lire votre fortune qu’une fois par jour Vana’dielien.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: Happiness is a state of mind. You can find laughter in even the most desperate of situations.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Formez un groupe avec la personne avec laquelle vous souhaitez vérifier votre fortune, puis parlez-moi pour une lecture de votre destin.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: The day ahead will be filled with trials and tribulations, but in time the path before you will run smooth once more.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Vous avez besoin de 120 gil pour faire lire votre fortune.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: There may be clashes of opinion today, but approach each other with an open mind and all will be well.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Ahhh, si seulement un aventurier fort et fiable passait par ici...${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: You must rely on each others' strengths to overcome the difficulties you will face today. Don't let petty squabbles bring your downfall.${prompt}
Phrase en Français: Eh bien, si ce n'est pas un aventurier fort et fiable! Que diriez-vous de mettre la main sur une belle récompense?${prompt}

Matchup: ${choice: 0}[San d'Oria vs Bastok/Bastok vs Windurst/Windurst vs San d'Oria]
Match Format: ${choice: 3}[All or Nothing * Normal Items Allowed/All or Nothing * Normal Items Restricted/Best of Three * Normal Items Allowed]${prompt}
While wearing ${keyitem-article: 0[2]} during a match, you will be able to hear the orders of your nation's Pursuivant. His advice will aid you in battle.${prompt}
Also, you will be informed of all the latest match information when entering select cities.${prompt}

By carrying ${keyitem-article: 0[2]} with you during a Ballista match, any temporary item you quarry will be automatically placed in your bag without you having to select whether you wish to keep it, use it, or throw it away.${prompt}
When your inventory is full, or you cannot carry any more of a certain item, the newly quarried item will be automatically discarded.

When carrying ${keyitem-article: 0[2]} with you while participating in a Ballista match, you will have the option to keep or throw away the first ${color: 5}Petra${color: 1} you find. This is useful when you want to continue /sprinting.${prompt}
If you wish, I can loan you one, free of charge.${prompt}
When in possession of the key item ${keyitem-singular: 0[2]}, temporary items will be automatically added to the player's inventory when quarried.${prompt}
When a player's inventory exceeds the maximum capacity, any temporary item found will simply be discarded.
You can speak to me to borrow or return the shovel at any time.${prompt}

When in possession of the key item ${keyitem-singular: 0[2]}, you will have the choice of keeping or throwing away the first Petra you quarry. You will also retain the ability to ${color: 5}sprint${color: 1}.${prompt}
You can speak to me to borrow or return the band at any time.${prompt}
I apologize, but your level is too low to participate in an official Brenner match.${prompt}
Official matches are scheduled to begin at the following times:
Teleportation to the Isle is free of charge, but a participation fee of ${number: 0} gil is required before each match.${prompt}
What would you like to know about?
The basic rules of Brenner are as follows:${prompt}
First, the participants divide into two teams. Each side's camp contains the same number of “Flammen-Brenner.”${prompt}
At the beginning of the match, half of each side's Flammen-Brenner will be ablaze with “Flamme,” or flame, while the other half will remain unlit.${prompt}
Participants can seize a Flamme from the opposing side's Flammen-Brenner and carry it around the Isle.${prompt}
The goal is to steal your opponent's Flamme and use them to light your side's Flammen-Brenner.${prompt}
The side that succeeds in lighting all of its Flammen-Brenner will be declared the winner after a specified amount of time.${prompt}
If neither side is victorious before the match ends, the outcome will be judged based on the score. The “match score” section of the rulebook contains more information on this subject.${prompt}
Brenner is significantly divided into public and private matches. Official matches are held periodically according to level and feature general participation.${prompt}
You cannot reserve the Isle when an official match is being held.${prompt}
No items are necessary for participation, but a minor fee will be collected. You will be unable to participate if your level is too low.${prompt}

The match outcome will be recorded unless the number of participants fails to exceed ${number: 0} members, or if there are fewer than ${number: 1} members in a match where the two sides' numbers differ. In such cases, the game will be considered a training match and will not be recorded.${prompt}
Private matches require a reservation, and participation may be limited. The ${color: 5}Master of Ceremonies${color: 1} (MC) can freely adjust the rules and control match proceedings.${prompt}
“LS Liga” is a form of private match. You can learn more about LS Liga by speaking to a Marshal.${prompt}
A Flammen-Brenner is a device that contains a Flamme (flame). The Flammen-Brenner is covered by a grate that will open after taking a set amount of damage, exposing the Flamme.${prompt}

The participants must utilize this chance to seize the Flamme before the grate recloses. Once the grate is closed, the Flammen-Brenner will begin recovering from the damage it has been dealt.${prompt}
If you manage to open the opposing team's Flammen-Brenner and capture their Flamme, you should make haste to light one of the Flammen-Brenner on your side.${prompt}
After a certain amount of time, the Flamme will burn out and the opposing team's Flammen-Brenner will be relit.${prompt}
Also, please note that you cannot quicken your pace using any special abilities while you are in possession of a Flamme.${prompt}
In the event that neither side fulfills the conditions for victory, the outcome of the match will be evaluated based on score.${prompt}

Ten points are awarded to each side for every lit Flammen-Brenner, while one point is awarded whenever a Flamme is captured, used to light a Flammen-Brenner, or recaptured from an opponent. One point is also awarded for protecting the Flammen-Brenner for a certain period of time.${prompt}
Like Ballista, ${color: 5}quarry${color: 1} (/quarry) can be used while playing Brenner. Participants may use this ability to dig up ${color: 5}Petras${color: 1} and temporary items.${prompt}
However, unlike Ballista Petras, Brenner Petras have no effect on the match score. You can ${color: 5}trade${color: 1} a Petra to a Pursuivant to recover your HP and MP at no expense to TP.${prompt}
${color: 5}Sprint${color: 1} cannot be used while carrying a Petra. Also, please note that the ${color: 5}scout${color: 1} ability cannot be used in Brenner.${prompt}
Petras will be lost in the event of a KO, but can be carried over from one match to another.${prompt}
The ${color: 5}sprint${color: 1} (/sprint) ability can be used to increase the player's speed when not in possession of a Flamme or Petras.${prompt}
In the event of a KO, you will be returned to your team's camp. However, recovery will take longer the more often you fall in battle.${prompt}
In other words, you will receive a penalty if you fall immediately after recovering from KO. In addition, your TP will be reduced to zero and you will lose any Petras in your possession.${prompt}
I'm sorry. I wasn't listening. Could you start over from the beginning?${prompt}

Hmph! You dang kids these days ain't got no respect for your elders. Can't you see I'm tryin' to learn this new fandangled fishin' method? In my day, all we had to do was cast a line and wait for the baby to tug. Why, back then it was so easy, I could catch fish while I was sleepin'!${prompt}
But now you gotta work for your meal! Let me tell you how it's done...

First, you fix a little bait on your line, toss it into the water, and wait for somethin' to bite. Eh? What's changed? Well, nothing yet! Would you just hold your horses and let me get to the good part?${prompt}

Now, once you feel the pull is where the real battle begins--and I say battle because that fish is not going to let you get him without a fight! If he starts tuggin' to the left, you've gotta pull to the right. If he starts tuggin' to the right, you've gotta pull to the left.${prompt}

Keepin' centered--that's the key to tirin' out that old puppy! And once you think you've softened him up enough, that's when you reel him in. If you ${color: 5}confirm${color: 1} a little too early, the fish may still have enough pep to run off with your bait. But if you spend too much time playin' with him, he might just get bored and be on his way.${prompt}

Of course, if you ever get a bad feeling that whatever's on the end of your line's fixin' to snap your rod in two, you could always ${color: 5}cancel${color: 1} your way out of things......sissy!${prompt}
Alright, did you get all that? Well, keep listenin', 'cause I'm not done yet.
This new type o' fishin' works differently with different types of rods.${prompt}

What would you like to ask about?
Just let me know if you ever get curious!${prompt}
The Vana'diel Chocobo Society, or VCS for short, is an international organization designed to train and dispatch chocogirls and chocoguys to stables across Vana'diel.${prompt}
They provide courses on practical chocobo riding and the proper ways to care for a chocobo, as well as working to improve the treatment of chocobos from here to Aht Urhgan.${prompt}
Anyone can join as long as they love chocobos. The VCS will help you with anything you need.${prompt}
Chicks hatch from eggs, grow into young chocobos, and finally mature.${prompt}
They grow much faster than people do. Usually it takes about 1 month (Earth time) before you can ride your chocobo.${prompt}
The chocobo's traits are determined by the way in which you care for your animal. Without proper planning, you won't be able to raise the type of chocobo that you want.${prompt}
But don't worry, because you have us to help! We're all in this together!${prompt}

“Strength” is a term used to describe the chocobo's leg power. The more strength a chocobo has, the faster it will be able to run. Rental chocobos have been raised with an emphasis on this attribute.${prompt}
Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as “Physical attributes.”${prompt}
“Endurance” is a term used to describe the chocobo's stamina. If your chocobo has high endurance, you will be able to ride it for a long period of time.${prompt}
Both strength and endurance are collectively referred to as “Physical attributes.”${prompt}
“Discernment” is a must for anyone who wants their chocobo to learn new abilities. You may want to consider raising this attribute if you are interested in digging for treasure.${prompt}
Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as “Mental attributes.”${prompt}

“Receptivity” is a term used to describe the chocobo's sensitivity when dealing with others. You can foster receptivity in your chocobo by giving it lots of opportunities to communicate with other chocobos.${prompt}
Both discernment and receptivity are collectively referred to as “Mental attributes.”${prompt}

“Energy” is a term used to describe the amount of power the chocobo needs to stay active for the day. If your chocobo has a lot of energy, care plans are more likely to be successful and you can provide more direct care for your chocobo.${prompt}
You can restore your chocobo's energy by feeding it, so remember not to skip out on feeding time after a demanding schedule!${prompt}
“Affection” is the most important attribute of all. Your care schedule will fall flat if you don't show your chocobo proper affection!${prompt}
You can raise your chocobo's affection by feeding it greens and caring for it on a regular basis.${prompt}
If you really want to raise your chocobo's affection quickly, you can give it ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, but I can't recommend doing so unless absolutely necessary.${prompt}
“Satisfaction” is a term used to describe how full or hungry your chocobo is. If your chocobo is full, it will gain a lot of energy before the next day.${prompt}
However, when the chocobo is very hungry, its energy will hardly recover at all and its affection will rapidly decrease.${prompt}
What would you like to ask about?
A care schedule is a series of plans that you set up for your chocobo so that we can take care of it while you are away.${prompt}
How you want us to care for your chocobo each day is completely up to you.${prompt}
You can register up to four plans at once, each for up to 7 days (Earth time).${prompt}
When you come to check on your chocobo, we will give you a report on the results. You should listen closely to the report and use it as reference when deciding on a new schedule.${prompt}
With the basic care plan, we will provide the minimum level of care for your chocobo. This plan is the most stable, and your chocobo will probably not experience any sudden changes.${prompt}
The basic care plan is good for those who don't want their chocobo's traits to change much or are still unsure of what kind of schedule to choose.${prompt}
You can select the basic care plan the moment you start raising your chocobo.${prompt}
The rest plan's name speaks for itself. We will give your chocobo a rest in order to restore its energy and cure any status abnormalities.${prompt}
However, your chocobo will not be able to eat any food you give it during the plan, because it will be in a deep sleep.${prompt}

We can take your chocobo for a walk in town to improve its physical attributes of strength and endurance. However, it will have a negative effect on its mental attributes of discernment and receptivity.${prompt}
Listening to music will improve your chocobo's mental attributes of discernment and receptivity. However, it will have a negative effect on its physical attributes of strength and endurance.${prompt}
Exercising alone will significantly improve your chocobo's strength. On the other hand, its mental attributes will markedly decrease.${prompt}
If the chocobo is strong, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo is weak, then you shouldn't push it too hard.${prompt}
Exercising with chocobos will build your animal's endurance. On the other hand, its mental attributes will decrease.${prompt}
If the chocobo has high endurance, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo's endurance is low, then you shouldn't push it too hard.${prompt}
Interacting with children helps your chocobo become a more discerning creature by interacting with people.${prompt}
However, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes, as no strenuous exercise is involved.${prompt}
If the chocobo has good discernment, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good discernment, then you shouldn't push it too hard.${prompt}
Interacting with other chocobos in the field will improve the chocobo's receptivity by fostering its communication skills.${prompt}
But because the focus is on communication and not exercise, this plan will have a negative effect on the chocobo's physical attributes.${prompt}
If the chocobo has good receptivity, this plan is quite effective, but if the chocobo does not have good receptivity, then you shouldn't push it too hard.${prompt}
You can choose to have your chocobo help deliver packages. Not only will this improve its physical attributes, but you will even receive payment for your services!${prompt}
The downside is that your chocobo's mental attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo, or you might find yourself getting cold treatment.${prompt}

You can choose to exhibit your chocobo to the public, which will allow anyone visiting the chocobo stables to take a look at your animal. Being the center of attention will help improve your chocobo's mental attributes.${prompt}
The downside is that your chocobo's physical attributes, energy, and affection will decrease. You must care well for your chocobo afterwards. Also, you will receive payment for this service.${prompt}
You can choose to have your chocobo deliver official messages for the nation. Not only will this improve its strength, but you will even receive payment for your services!${prompt}
However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.${prompt}
You can have your chocobo help out VCS finances by digging for treasure. This will also improve the chocobo's discernment.${prompt}
The VCS will sell the item and use the money for the organization's benefit, but will provide you with payment for your services.${prompt}
However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.${prompt}
You can choose to have your chocobo act as an extra in a play to improve its receptivity.${prompt}
You will receive payment in accordance with the chocobo's performance. However, this plan consumes quite a bit of your chocobo's energy, so you should feed it well to make up for it.${prompt}
What would you like to ask about?
In addition to setting the chocobo's schedule, you can also care directly for your chocobo whenever you like.${prompt}
Caring for your chocobo will increase its affection for you.${prompt}
On the other hand, a chocobo that receives too much care will lose energy more rapidly when engaging in activities. If you do nothing but care for your chocobo, it will become fatigued.${prompt}
However, not caring enough for your chocobo will have a negative effect on your relationship, so it is important to find a balance.${prompt}
You can watch over your chocobo whenever you like.${prompt}
Your fond gaze can communicate even more than a touch and will not have a very tiring effect on the animal.${prompt}
You can tell the chocobo a story you know. This will foster the animal's sensibilities.${prompt}
I've heard that by listening to the story, the chocobo might even realize it has powers it never noticed before. (I've never seen it happen before, though...)${prompt}
Sometimes your chocobo might start acting spoiled or refuse to do anything but sleep. In such times, you will need to firmly scold it.${prompt}
This will shame the animal and have an effect on its receptivity.${prompt}
Competing against other chocobos will cultivate your animal's ambitious spirit and is highly effective for bored chocobos.${prompt}
You can take your chocobo out for a walk in the field. You will be able to choose more destinations as your chocobo grows.${prompt}
I like to take the chocobo out often, too, but I'm sure it prefers going out with you.${prompt}
Leaving the stables every once in a while allows your chocobo to experience new sights and sounds. Maybe you'll even discover something new together!${prompt}
What would you like to know about?
Chocobos digest feed quickly, so they are often hungry.${prompt}
However, they also restore energy at a rapid pace. If you do not feed your chocobo properly, it will be unable to restore enough energy.${prompt}
The chocobo stables will provide your chocobo with the minimum amount of feed required for the animal to survive, but you need to provide more in order to ensure its healthy growth.${prompt}
At the same time, feeding your chocobo too much can result in a stomachache. Remember to strike a balance with both the variety and quantity of feed you give to your animal!${prompt}
Some types of feed have special effects, so it is important not to neglect your chocobo's diet if you want to raise a good chocobo.${prompt}
There are different methods of acquiring these special types of feed, so be on the lookout for them!${prompt}
Just ${color: 5}trade${color: 1} the feed to an advanced chocobo trainer, and they will give it to your chocobo.${prompt}
This is the standard variety of chocobo feed, among which ${item-plural: 0[2]} are most popular.${prompt}
Chocobos also seem to enjoy ${item-plural: 0[2]} and ${item-plural: 1[2]}.${prompt}
These greens are the most effective in satisfying a chocobo's hunger. Chocobos also enjoy the taste, which raises affection for their owner.${prompt}
Wildgrasses are a type of medicinal herb. They do not taste very good, but are highly effective at curing status abnormalities.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, for example, works well on wounds. So although they look similar to ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}, the effects are different.${prompt}

In addition, ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} is effective for illness, and ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} for a stomachache. It's a good idea to remember which herb to use in each situation.${prompt}
Carrots are high in nutrition, and will have an effect on the chocobo's strength and discernment.${prompt}

${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 0[2]}, for example, affect the chocobo's physical attributes, and ${item-plural: 1[2]} are good for its mental attributes. ${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 2[2]} are in a category of their own.${prompt}
Remember, though, that the results are very slight, and keeping a good care schedule is a far more efficient way to alter your chocobo's attributes.${prompt}
Using worms as feed can have a variety of effects. They might look disgusting, but their effectiveness is not to be ignored!${prompt}
For example, ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} will dramatically increase your chocobo's affection, and ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} will restore its energy.${prompt}
But watch out for the side effects... Give the chocobo a worm at the wrong time, and all your effort could come to nothing...${prompt}
The most curious of all the worms is the ${item-singular: 0[2]}. At first it may not seem to have any effect, but looks are deceiving...${prompt}
Medicines can cure a chocobo in the blink of an eye.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} will restore your chocobo's energy in full, making it easier to care for and ensuring that the care schedule goes smoothly.${prompt}

${lettercase: 1}${item-plural: 0[2]} are effective for most status abnormalities, restoring instant health to your chocobo. Of course, you still need to continue caring for your chocobo so it can fully recover.${prompt}
A potion can also help fill a chocobo's stomach, so they can be useful when you are short on feed.${prompt}
Feed can be ground into paste for chicks to eat.${prompt}
You can make paste yourself with some cooking skill. If you don't have enough cooking skill yourself, then you might want to ask a friend to make some for you.${prompt}
Chicks can also eat regular feed, though.${prompt}
Which would you like to ask about?
Your chocobo may learn useful abilities during the course of its life at the stables.${prompt}
For example, Auto-Regen will increase the rate at which your chocobo restores energy. Such an ability is sure to come in handy in a variety of situations.${prompt}
Your chocobo learns abilities by listening to your words, so if you know of any story that you think might interest the animal, you should tell it often.${prompt}
But remember, your chocobo can't learn all of the abilities there are. It can only learn two...or at least, that's what I read.${prompt}
The chocobo's temperament is determined when it is just a chick. Its temperament and attributes are somehow related, but I'm not really sure how.${prompt}
Chocobos generally like sunny days, but they could grow to like other kinds of weather depending on how they are raised.${prompt}
Chocobos pay attention to the air outside when they go on walks, and grow to prefer that type of weather because of the memories.${prompt}

Make the animal's schedule around its preferred weather days, and plans are more likely to succeed. However, if the chocobo has a favored type of weather, it also dislikes certain conditions, creating a weak point to watch for.${prompt}
You can choose to retire your chocobo at any time after it has fully matured.${prompt}
After retirement, the VCS will take up caring for the chocobo where you left off, so you need not worry about its welfare.${prompt}
When your chocobo retires, you will receive ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}. Be sure not to lose it.${prompt}
You can use the ${item-singular: 0[2]} to register your chocobo to call in the field or for matchmaking purposes after retirement. All you need to do is trade it to a VCS member.${prompt}
The empty stall created after your animal retires can be used for raising other chocobos, so if you happen to come across another egg, you can bring it here to start all over again!${prompt}
When your chocobo is mature enough, you can breed it with another chocobo. If the chocobo lays an egg, the chick will inherit the traits of its parents.${prompt}

You will need ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} and ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]} if you want to breed your chocobo. Apparently, you also need some kind of ticket that they sell at the stables in Upper Jeuno.${prompt}
You can ask one of the VCS members to issue you a chococard, or if your chocobo is already retired, just trade them ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}.${prompt}
I don't really know that much about it, but you should probably try matching your chocobo up with several different animals and seeing what the results are.${prompt}
When your chocobo is mature enough, you can call it in the field using ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}.${prompt}
You need to let a member of the VCS know which chocobo you want to respond to your call, because they must choose a saddle that fits your chocobo's attributes.${prompt}
That also means that when your chocobo's attributes change or it learns a new ability, you should probably let the VCS member know, too.${prompt}
When you want to register a retired chocobo to respond to your call in the field, trade ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} to a VCS member.${prompt}
Also, the ${item-singular: 0[2]}'s power will grow weak after you've used it several times.${prompt}
If this happens, just trade it to a VCS member and they will give you a new one for a fee.${prompt}

${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} proves that you are your chocobo's caretaker.${prompt}
With this card, you can register a retired chocobo to respond to your call in the field or get a chococard for matchmaking.${prompt}
If you lose it, you won't be able to get another one, so keep it in a safe place!${prompt}
You can use ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} to call your chocobo in the field to use as a mount.${prompt}
The more you use it, the weaker it will get, so eventually you will need to exchange it to a VCS member for a new one.${prompt}

Our original plan was to establish locations across Vana'diel where people could test their birds' skills.${prompt}
We felt that this would help us maintain breeder motivation, which in turn would ensure healthier, happier chocobos. A “win-win situation,” as we like to call it in the business.${prompt}
However, as rumors of these new facilities began to leak out into the world, people began speculating about the possibility of officially sanctioned chocobo races...${prompt}
The VCS could not ignore the voice of the masses, and it was not long before a meeting was held, a vote was taken, and the CRA was formed.${prompt}
And that's why I'm here, trying to enlist you and other top breeders into our noble ranks.${prompt}
Oh, and for our more seasoned veterans who feel there are no challenges left for them here at the track, the CRA has finished preparing a new race. And rumor has that it's a doozie!${prompt}
First of all, your chocobo must be fully grown. It doesn't matter if you are still tending to it, or if it has been sent to pasture, as long as it is large enough to ride.${prompt}
Next, you must bring me either ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} or ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}. This is all I will require. There are no hidden fees.${prompt}
As your chocobo develops, be sure to re-register it. This will ensure that your steed is provided with the equipment that most suits its current condition.${prompt}
Finally, you may only register one chocobo at a time, but are free to register a new bird whenever you wish. You need only speak with me to make any necessary changes.${prompt}
Once you have registered your chocobo and entered it in a competition, the CRA will proceed in assigning it a licensed jockey.${prompt}
Before each race you will be given the opportunity to give the jockey specific orders on his or her riding style.${prompt}
In addition to these orders, you can also provide the jockey with items to use while riding, as well as equipment to improve your chocobo's performance.${prompt}

Before a race, you can also check the strengths and weaknesses of the other participating chocobos. It is recommended that you use this data when deciding on what orders to give, or which items to equip.${prompt}
Depending on your chocobo's performance in select CRA-sanctioned races, you may or may not receive a prize consisting of VCS-mint ${color: 5}chocobucks${color: 1}.${prompt}
Chocobucks can be used to purchase items, as well as upgrade your mount. Chocobucks are also required to participate in official races.${prompt}
Currently, players can earn up to, but no more than, 1000 chocobucks. However, this may change without notice.${prompt}
There are two main types of races.${prompt}
The first type is called an ${color: 5}official race${color: 1}. To participate in one of these, you will require chocobucks.${prompt}
Placing in an official race will earn you gil. The more races you complete, the more respected you will become in the breeder community.${prompt}
You may also take part in an official race as often as needed to complete the specified objectives.${prompt}

However, after some of the more grueling races, you may be required to wait before entering the next. This is to give your chocobo, as well as the others, an opportunity to rest before running again.${prompt}
The second type of race is called a ${color: 5}free run${color: 1}. Unlike the official races, these can be run at any time, regardless of the results of a previous match.${prompt}

You must pay a fee in gil to participate in free runs, but you will have the opportunity to earn chocobucks depending on your chocobo's performance. You can join as many free runs as you wish in a single day (Earth time), but extra fees may be required for each additional race. (Stable hands have to make a living, too!)${prompt}
The CRA is split up into three racing teams representing Bastok, Windurst, and San d'Oria.${prompt}
Each team has its own skilled jockeys, and offers unique services that cannot be obtained at the other two.${prompt}
Breeders are allowed to register with any team they like, and may change their affiliation at any time.${prompt}
In the event that you wish to leave a racing team, all official race results, as well as earned chocobucks, will be saved.${prompt}
You never have to worry that your past accomplishments may be deleted and lost forever. You only need rejoin the team to restore all your old data.${prompt}
Anyway, there is no harm in visiting all three racing teams to find which one suits you best (though I know you'll choose this one).${prompt}

Depending on a team's weekly standings, its members may suffer certain eligibility restrictions. At the same time, they may also be privy to certain benefits.${prompt}
The teams in second and third place will have the advantage of being allowed more entry positions in any given race, while those of the leading team are restricted.${prompt}
The leading team will, however, be granted the privilege of selecting higher-quality saddles for their race chocobos.${prompt}
The CRA reserves the right to impose a handicap system when it is determined that the gap in skill between chocobos is simply too great to make for a fair race.${prompt}
In such an event, the “less endowed” of the chocobos will be granted certain enhancing effects, such as Haste or Refresh.${prompt}
Whether handicaps will be enforced or not will be determined after signups are complete. Make sure to keep an eye on your chocobo's settings.${prompt}
Each race title will include a code, such as C4. This code is the “race grade.”${prompt}
For example, a “C4 Chocobo Race” would indicate a typical grade 4 race.${prompt}
We have four race grades, ranging from C4 to C1. The lower the number, the higher the grade. This, of course, means larger entry fees, but also more prize money.${prompt}

No matter which race you enter, upon completion you will be prevented from joining any other races for a period of 20 hours (Earth time). Higher-grade races carry larger purses, so most racers like to use their opportunities to go after those.${prompt}
Solo Victory Points will be awarded to you every race, depending on how well you finish.${prompt}
As your Solo Victory Points accumulate, your chocobo will be able to gain entry to high-grade races.${prompt}
Should a racer return to the circuit after an absence of four weeks or more, the CRA will be forced to deduct a number of Solo Victory Points.${prompt}

Only on the rarest of occasions will such penalties be imposed. However, there are some races in which you will be unable to participate if you do not have a certain amount of Solo Victory Points in your possession.${prompt}
Also, obtaining Solo Victory Points will also grant your nation Team Victory Points.${prompt}
The three teams are in constant competition with one another, and a weekly ranking system is in place based on Team Victory Point totals.${prompt}
As a team climbs up in rank, certain benefits will follow. You may see new items available for purchase with chocobucks, preferential treatment at the races, and so on.${prompt}
Keep in mind that should you change your team affiliation, you will be forced to forfeit any accumulated Solo Victory Points.${prompt}
We have a total of four races that run in succession.${prompt}
Each race has its own dedicated signup window. Here there will be four attendants ready to serve all your racing needs.${prompt}
Even if the race registration at one window closes, registration for the next race will begin immediately at the neighboring window.${prompt}
Races will be held one after the other, so you'll have plenty of chances to watch and bet. Sit back, relax, and enjoy!${prompt}
What would you like to hear more about?
There are a few facts that you should know before running in a race.${prompt}
First of all, you absolutely must be affiliated with one of the three official racing teams. These, as you may already know, are San d'Oria, Bastok, and Windurst.${prompt}
Secondly, it is required that your bird be registered as a “race chocobo,” for obvious reasons. No race chocobo, no race.${prompt}
Thirdly, you will be responsible for providing your own items to be used during the race. The CRA leaves this to the racer's discretion...${prompt}
All of these services can be provided at any racing center, but to facilitate the registration process it is recommended that you conduct all such affairs at the appropriate branch.${prompt}
A racing fee is necessary to gain entry into a chocobo race. The racing center will inform you of the cost, so please be sure to pay when signing up for a race.${prompt}
Also, when signing up to race, you will be able to choose a saddle, as well as the lane in which your chocobo will race.${prompt}

There are multifarious saddles at the rider's disposal, each of which will affect your chocobo's conditioning. In addition, the types of saddles available will change depending on your team's current ranking.${prompt}
There are a total of eight lanes, but general conditions for all of them are the same. Feel free to race in the lane of your choice.${prompt}
Setting these options will complete the signup process. You will then be given ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]}, which you will need to exchange later to collect any winnings.${prompt}

In the event that you should lose or misplace your ${item-singular: 0[2]}, you will be unable to collect any prize money, chocobucks, or Victory Points that you may be entitled to. I cannot stress enough how important it is to hold on to it.${prompt}
The races can be viewed from our grandstand area. Take a seat and cheer on your bird!${prompt}
You will be eligible for prize money if your chocobo places either first, second, or third.${prompt}
To collect, simply hand in the ${item-singular: 0[2]} you received during race signup at any signup center.${prompt}
The amount of gil, chocobucks, and Victory Points you qualify to receive will be based upon your bird's placement.${prompt}
You will lose the right to collect your winnings from a race exactly one week after that race has ended.${prompt}
After participating in a race, your chocobo will be unable to join any other races for a period of 20 hours (Earth time).${prompt}
This pertains only to races held here, and will not affect your eligibility for races held at any other racetracks.${prompt}
We have implemented these restrictions here as to allow the greatest number of participants' entry into our races. Your patience and understanding are appreciated.${prompt}
What would you like to ask?
Chocobetting is a form of entertainment where bettors attempt to pick the two birds that will finish first and second in a race.${prompt}
To make it a bit more interesting, the bettor can then wager on their picks in increments of 100 gil.${prompt}
Should lady luck smile upon you and your picks hit, you can win prize money, the amount of which is determined by the odds for that race.${prompt}
For example, let's say that you were to bet ten quills (1000 gil) on Entries No. 5 and No. 7.${prompt}

And let's say that the toteboard showed the odds for the race at 110 gil. If your picks were to finish as the top two birds, you would be eligible to collect 1100 gil in winnings, for a total profit of 100 gil.${prompt}
Of course, it goes without saying that should your picks not have the fortune of finishing in the top two places, you will receive absolutely no gil.${prompt}
The gambler's fallacy is our mantra here at the racetrack! Remember, you are special! Let it ride!${prompt}
To place a chocobet, you must obtain ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} from the chocobet center. ${prompt}
For any single ${item-singular: 0[2]}, a bettor may purchase up to 999 quills. Each quill costs 100 gil.${prompt}
We highly recommend that you obtain information on the chocobos you will be betting on before purchasing your ticket. It is always good to know where your money is going.${prompt}
Odds determine how much gil you will receive in winnings per quill on your chocobet ticket.${prompt}

Winnings are calculated by taking the total monetary sum of all bets for any given pairing. For example, should ten bettors each place the same 100-quill (10,000 gil) chocobet, the total used to determine the winnings would be 100,000 gil.${prompt}
It goes without saying that not all bettors will be winners. The money from losing bets is used to pay off the winners.${prompt}

What this means is that if you place a bet on an unseemly chocobo pairing, or pick two birds without much money riding on them, and are fortunate enough to win, you can make quite a tidy sum.${prompt}

Toteboards display the odds at both the chocobet center as well as the grandstand. Toteboards have eight columns with the number on top of each column representing one chocobo, and the number to the left of each column representing another. If your bet is for chocobos No. 2 and No. 5, check the #2 column to see how much a 2-5 bet will pay per quill.${prompt}
The odds are constantly changing right up until the race begins. If the number of bets on a popular chocobo pairing keeps increasing, then consequently the odds will go down.${prompt}
Even if you place a large bet early on, the odds may still change as time passes. So take your time and consider carefully.${prompt}
Chocobets can be placed as soon as the signup period for a race has ended. The betting window will close several minutes before the race begins.${prompt}
Make sure to get your bet in on time. Even if you are in the middle of placing a bet, it will be cancelled if you exceed the allowed time window by even a single second.${prompt}
Once the race is finished, you can exchange your ${item-singular: 0[2]} at any chocobet center to collect your winnings.${prompt}
Without ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} you will be unable to collect your winnings, so make sure not to lose it.${prompt}
${lettercase: 1}${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} is valid for up to one week (Earth time) after completion of the race for which it was purchased.${prompt}
Should one week pass, we will be unable to accept the ticket, so it is always best to cash out as soon as possible.${prompt}

This service area is here to accommodate our more experienced and accomplished racers.${prompt}

My apologies, ${choice-player-gender}[sir/ma'am], but it appears that you have yet to conduct all of the necessary processing at the service area for advanced and veteran racers. Please speak to the attendants there for further assistance.${prompt}
Which would you like to hear about?
How do I register for a race?
How do I prepare for a race?
What kinds of races are there?

With the establishment of the Chocobo Circuit and the introduction of chocobo races, the hidden talents of a number of chocobos across Vana'diel finally had a venue in which to come to fruition.${prompt}
As the next step, the CRA recognized these rare and valuable talents, and developed a new, special kind of race to showcase them even more than before!${prompt}
Without the interference of jockeys, breeders can now pit their chocobos head-to-head against a number of monster species in brutal, raw, no-holds-barred racing! ${prompt}
Even some of the CRA's very own best and brightest chocobos will be entering into these races geared specifically to our veteran clientele.
What more thrilling way to spend a day at the races than to see Vana'diel's most elite chocobos competing against its most fiendish monsters!?${prompt}
First of all, your chocobo must be fully grown. It doesn't matter if you are still tending to it, or if it has been sent to pasture, as long as it is large enough to ride.${prompt}
Next, you must bring me either ${article} ${item-article: 0[2]} or ${article} ${item-article: 1[2]}. This is all I will require. There are no hidden fees.${prompt}
As your chocobo develops, be sure to re-register it. This will ensure that your steed is provided with the equipment that most suits its current condition.${prompt}
Finally, you may only register one chocobo at a time, but are free to register a new bird whenever you wish. You need only speak with me to make any necessary changes.${prompt}

Since these races are geared towards our more veteran racers and will not make use of jockeys, all in-race conduct is based solely on the chocobos themselves. The CRA wants these races to be as pure as possible!${prompt}
The same philosophy applies to the usage of items as well. Simply preset the items you wish for your chocobo to have at its disposal.
It will use them as it sees fit based on real-time assessment of racing conditions.${prompt}
Many breeders are distressed by these rules, but we assure you there is no need for concern.

If your chocobo has progressed far enough in the Chocobo Circuit to even be participating in the Monster Races, it is a given that it has enough know-how to use its items wisely. Have faith in your bird.${prompt}
Also, as with other races in the past, you will be able to check on the strengths and weaknesses of your opponents at this service area.
Many breeders like to use this information for developing their race strategies, and we encourage you to do the same.${prompt}
Depending on your chocobo's performance in select CRA-sanctioned races, you may or may not receive a prize consisting of VCS-mint ${color: 5}chocobucks${color: 1}.${prompt}
Chocobucks can be used to purchase items, as well as upgrade your mount. Chocobucks are also required to participate in official races.${prompt}
Currently, players can earn up to, but no more than, 1000 chocobucks. However, this may change without notice.${prompt}
There are two main types of races.${prompt}
The first type is called an ${color: 5}official race${color: 1}. To participate in one of these, you will require chocobucks.${prompt}
Placing in an official race will earn you gil. The more races you complete, the more respected you will become in the breeder community.${prompt}
You may also take part in an official race as often as needed to complete the specified objectives.${prompt}

However, after some of the more grueling races, you may be required to wait before entering the next. This is to give your chocobo, as well as the others, an opportunity to rest before running again.${prompt}

The second type of race is called a ${color: 5}free run${color: 1}. Unlike the official races, these can be run at any time, regardless of the results of a previous match. In addition, you will have the opportunity to earn chocobucks depending on your chocobo's performance.${prompt}
You are not able to sign up for free runs at this location. To do so, please visit the appropriate service area for beginning and intermediate racers.
The CRA is split up into three racing teams representing Bastok, Windurst, and San d'Oria.${prompt}
Each team has its own skilled jockeys, and offers unique services that cannot be obtained at the other two.${prompt}
Breeders are allowed to register with any team they like, and may change their affiliation at any time.${prompt}
In the event that you wish to leave a racing team, all official race results, as well as earned chocobucks, will be saved.${prompt}
You never have to worry that your past accomplishments may be deleted and lost forever. You only need rejoin the team to restore all your old data.${prompt}
Anyway, there is no harm in visiting all three racing teams to find which one suits you best (though I know you'll choose this one).${prompt}
Your opponents in the official monster races will be any of a host of beasts reared and trained by racing aficionado and announcer extraordinaire, Markovich.${prompt}
We ensure all participating breeders that these monsters are in no way enhanced or engineered for racing excellence.
The CRA has been adamant about maintaining race participants to as close to their natural state of being as possible.${prompt}
Though each variety of monster does in fact possess characteristic abilities and traits.
And they have undergone extensive training to optimize their use of these in races.${prompt}
As with the chocobos, however, the monsters will be absent jockeys of any kind.
It is possible, and expected, that they will often unleash their wild, animalistic instincts on the racetrack.
In the spirit of drawing crowds, the CRA has also elected to place some of their finest birds on the racing roster as well.
Breeders can also expect to see other superior-class chocobos taking part.
It's going to take a lot more than just speed and endurance to win these races!${prompt}
Finally, in the absence of jockeys, finish-line sensors will be employed.
These devices will be attached to the contestants' ankles, or in the absence of ankles, some other such appropriate place.${prompt}
And now, Markovich's undeniably unorthodox, and arguably downright unethical, monster race is about to begin!${prompt}
Following such a fine showing in the Dueler's Race, the next contest is about to start! Who will be the last beast standing?${prompt}
Warning! The next race contains monsters of unprecedented nastiness. Enter at your own risk! The name says it all!${prompt}
What's this? We've been asked to pass along yet another challenge, this time from an anonymous source!
I'm not altogether clear on what is about to transpire...${prompt}
The games are over, ladies and gentlemen. Markovich is laying it all on the table. Here come his most ferocious beasts to date!${prompt}
This is the moment you've all been waiting for. The CRA has brought its racing elite out from the stables!
The treacherous offroad track is fraught with perils! And an absolutely awe-inspiring trophy is ready for the winner!
Bragging rights for life are on the line!${prompt}
